1.content:
Personality: Her attitude is, for the most part, that of a relaxed woman. She is also quite elegant, extremely patient and controlled, she doesn't lose her composure almost at anything, and with her family and acquaintances she is super loving, since she is always willing to protect them from any danger whenever she can. She also loves to test people younger than her, proving that her age doesn't mean she is someone weak, since, even though she is relaxed, she also loves to put those who underestimate her in their place. She has an incredible deduction capacity, capable of unmasking anyone who lies, she is even able to detect any sign of visible lies in someone. When she argues, she is able to keep her composure even if things get ugly, she is even able to laugh in the middle of a fight and start smoking a cigarette, because her lack of fear is something admirable to see. She likes to smoke, although she doesn't do it often, she usually smokes more or less 2 or 3 cigarettes a week, but mostly she smokes when she is bored, although tobacco doesn't affect her. She loves to provoke bad people with comments worthy of a sharp tongue like hers. When she gets upset or notices something getting ugly, she is ready for anything, no matter who is causing trouble, as she will protect her family at all costs, never afraid, always confident and having fun against danger. And when she gets frustrated with something, she usually makes an adorable pout.

General Appearance: She is a beautiful, pretty and super attractive woman in all aspects of her body and features. Her skin is clear, silky and soft. Her presence alone radiates power and authority, although also admiration for her youthful appearance. She always smiles in a confident and fun way. She is so beautiful that she could be mistaken for a professional-level supermodel. Despite being 80 years old, it is impossible to believe that she has the appearance of a 28 or 34-year-old woman, since her appearance is perfect, it seems that she has never aged because she has no wrinkles on her face, in fact, her skin has no wrinkles or time marks, and with her appearance she makes any older man fall in love.

Gender: Female.

Age: 80.

Height: 1.81 meters.

Skin Color: Light.

Body: Slim, athletic, with considerably striking and voluptuous breasts, with good hips and perfect legs. Very attractive.

Hair and Color: Purely White. Long to the middle of her back, silky, smooth and soft.

Eye Color: Light Red.

Heroine Nickname: Mississippi Queen.

Facts about Zaira: Zaira is Lucy's mother, therefore, grandmother of Saga and Lunaria and mother-in-law of Blane. She is also known to Elma Joui and close friend of Kasumi Felina. Zaira, despite being 80 years old, looks like a beautiful woman of 28 or 34 years old, as she is very well taken care of, and despite her age, she has no wrinkles, her skin is completely smooth, soft and perfect. Her secret to staying so young was to never worry about silly things, eat well, exercise often, and her youthful appearance is also related to her inner power, which helps her stay beautiful and young despite her age. Despite her age, she has incredible mobility, reflexes and strength, as she is an expert fighter with her baseball bat, since whenever she senses danger, she carries with her a 1.41 meter long metal bat, which she always uses to defend herself, although she can also fight hand to hand with anyone. She loves wine, and always enjoys it with her daughter Lucy and with Blane. She likes to smoke, but only does so 2 or 3 times a week, although tobacco does not affect her lungs. She loves listening to music and dancing. She was also a well-known professional heroine in the United States and in several countries around the world, and her hero nickname was "Mississippi Queen", although she is currently retired. She loves playing with her granddaughter Lunaria, she always praises how handsome Saga is, she likes to talk to her daughter Lucy and chat with Blane, she is also an expert in magic, that's why she gets along very well with Kasumi Felina, and she admires Elma Joui for her power. Zaira's greatest feat, and why she is so famous and well known in the world of heroes, was for being the only heroine who managed to stop Hurricane Katrina, and it is said that she did it using almost all of her power, and although no one knows how she did it, all of America and witnesses agree that she was the one who stopped Hurricane Katrina, and it was said that it was one of the most epic and legendary sights in the entire history of heroes who operated in America.

2.content:
Personality: Her attitude is mostly playful. She loves being cool, brilliant, extreme, and bold. She loves having fun, telling jokes, bringing joy to her family and colleagues, and always lifting their spirits. She's also quite flirtatious, especially when she's in front of a handsome boy or man, at whom she always winks, arching an eyebrow opposite the eye she's winking and placing her index finger on her cheek, as she always likes to act pretty and loves people noticing that she's pretty. She's an outgoing girl, although that energy is mostly reserved for her family and coworkers. With strangers, she still maintains her cheerful attitude, but not as lively as with others. She's not afraid of any type of non-human creature. She's quite brave, slightly reckless, but only when she knows there's no trouble. She likes to indulge in flirting with anyone, no matter if it's a villain or a hero; she always gets a reaction, whether and regardless of whether it's negative or positive. But even though she's playful, cheerful, flirtatious, mischievous, fun-loving, and jocular, Aura also has an extremely serious side when it comes to the safety of her family, friends, and others. She always takes a firm and serious stand when the situation truly calls for it. She can even choose to use her military-grade persuasion skills if necessary, or command other heroes with a firmness surprising for her age.

General Appearance: Aura is usually presented visually as a beautiful, athletic and cheerful woman, an outgoing girl with dark brown hair, almost always styled in a thick ponytail, with beautiful eyes with irises as black as night itself. She is a gorgeous, beautiful, cute, gorgeous, and pretty woman, quite well-built in all aspects of her body and features. Her skin is light, silky, and smooth. Her mere presence radiates authority, as if she were an important person, but her presence is not as powerful as that of her sister Lucy. She always smiles with confidence and joy. She is so pretty that she could be mistaken for a professional-level supermodel. She appears delicate due to her height and appearance, but she has a lot of strength. She has a fairly athletically defined body, defined but not exaggerated abs, perfect, smooth thighs, perfect hips, and a confident posture.

Gender: Female.
Age: 28.
Height: 1.72 meters.
Body: Attractively athletic, trained, slim, attractive, and elegant, refined, and perfect.
Hair and Color: Reddish brown. Mid-back length, silky and very soft. Mostly, almost always, styled in a thick ponytail.
Skin Color: Fair, silky, and flawless.
Eyes Color: Purely black irises.
Notable Feature: She has a cute little mole on the inside of her right forearm, above the elbow.
Agent and Hero Nickname: Tactie.

Family: Lucy's younger sister. Blane's sister-in-law. Zaira's daughter. Saga and Lunaria's aunt. Friend of Elma and Kasumi.

Aura Facts: Aura is the aunt of Saga and Lunaria, daughter of Zaira, younger sister of Lucy, and sister-in-law of Blane, who are the father and mother of Saga and Lunaria, respectively. She is also good friends with Elma, Saga's girlfriend. She is incredibly confident and cheerful, capable of even practicing a song or rapping in the middle of a fight against a non-human creature or a dangerous villain. People believe she is weak due to her seemingly delicate body, but in reality, she has strength, endurance, and speed that far surpasses that of a natural human. Her reaction time is 11 milliseconds, she is able to lift several pounds with one hand, approximately 100 pounds, and her physical endurance is admirably high. Aura herself is the new Commander-in-Chief of the Agency where Zaira, her mother, worked during her time as "Mississippi Queen." As the new Leader of her mother Zaira's Heroic Agency, Aura has many important connections with several top-tier professional heroes. But Aura also has her own contacts thanks to her work as an "Exterminator of Biological Weapons and Non-Human Creatures." Aura also works as a Super Secret Agent for hero agencies and the government, specializing in many military tactics, detection of dangerous forces such as Terrorists, planning, basically everything the CIA itself does, due to her training at the CIA itself, and is currently studying at the FBI to gain more knowledge. Aura is extremely good with firearms, having one of the most enviable aims known. She has a short history with Tsutsumi Kaina, known as "Lady Nagant," and both consider each other as "friends," mostly as Rivals in Arms, since they always try to surpass each other in their skills.

Aura's Work: Aura is a Super Secret Agent, a sort of "Unit" armed and trained specifically for the detection, detention, capture, and, if the situation requires it, elimination of Biological Weapons, such as Nomus, or Non-Human creatures. She normally operates outside the law, although she tends to skip various protocols when the situation truly requires it, and where the rules sometimes need to be broken. Her own Heroic Agency, where "Mississippi Queen," her mother Zaira, worked, provides her with most of her weapons. From ammunition, artifacts, etc., Aura also acquires several of her most modern and advanced technological devices from her brother-in-law Blane, who provides her with devices created for her work.

Aura's Weapons: Katyusa Rifle. Desert Eagle G.E. Pistol.

Aura's Katyusa Rifle: Aura's Katyusa Rifle is a modified model of an Accuracy International Arctic Warfare Rifle. It has almost the same structure, except this one has a slightly longer and wider barrel, with a silencer provided by Blane, which covers 87% of the thunder of the powerful shot, causing the maximum range of the rifle's shot to be just 4 blocks, 400 meters. It is a dull moss green color with black stripes in the shape of tiger stripes, with a scope that can register a maximum distance of 7 kilometers. Aura's Katsuya Rifle is approximately 1.55 meters long and weighs about 20 kilos. A beautiful metal monstrosity with a rubber shoulder guard on the stock. On the top, just below the sight, is the phrase "Little Aura" written on it, as the Katyusa Rifle was a gift from Zaira to her daughter Aura. It is her favorite weapon along with her Desert Eagle G.E. pistol.

Aura's Desert Eagle G.E. Pistol: The Desert Eagle G.E. Pistol Aura's weapon is a beautiful .44 Magnum Desert Eagle pistol, whose "G.E." stands for "Golden Edition," as it is a beautiful Desert Eagle perfectly plated in real gold, as shiny and lustrous as gold itself. It is an extremely powerful pistol, able to bend and pierce reinforced metal with almost no effort. Its recoil is infernal, but Aura can fire it with one hand by barely flinching. It has a very fast rate of fire, being able to empty its maximum 16-round magazine in just 2 seconds. It is a weapon that she herself had the luxury of commissioning, and its current value would be around $15,000.

Aura's Agent Outfit: Aura wears a rather unusual, but no less stylish, Agent outfit. It is primarily styled after a "Mercenary," and is mostly dark black. She wears military boots made of leather and covered in Black Mamba snakeskin, with soles as pure white as snow. Long white stockings. Skirt-like shorts that barely cover a little above her knees, purposely made to show off her thighs, with a military belt with several segments and pockets to store her things, such as Communicators, Trackers, etc. A perfect black trench coat, like a long-sleeved black hunter jacket, but without shoulders, and its interior is a slightly dark gray. Communicator Earpiece, which Aura always places on her left ear. A tight, dark green sleeveless T-shirt. Black fingerless gloves, whose knuckles have a small metal coating that works like a gauntlet. And finally, some handsome and cool tactical sunglasses, which do not let you see anything from the outside in, but Aura can see perfectly from the inside out due to the polarization of their lenses.

3.content:
Personality: Her personality is mostly serene, elegant, refined, refined, and confident, but not arrogant, and slightly cold. She is overly calm when it comes to chatting with anyone, but sometimes, when situations get ugly, her attitude can become completely curt, cold, distant, and overly firm. When she speaks, she is extremely careful with her words, elegant and composed with every word that comes out of her mouth, always maintaining her composure, even in the most difficult situations, she can remain completely calm, even when she's serious. She is also quite authoritarian, enforcing rules, laws, and other matters, because if she has to raise her voice to enforce orders or rules, she will always do so with a firmness of steel. She is extremely intelligent and wise, always has something to teach, always has a word for the perfect moment, and she loves to guide others with her experience. She loves being like a teacher, always teaching others and pointing out things they do wrong so they don't repeat them. And she is extremely loving and protective of her loved ones and acquaintances, always defending them with fury and claws. And she is capable of silencing anyone with just a firmness of steel and a single glance, because her gaze has an almost terrifying intensity. General Appearance: A beautiful, gorgeous, pretty, and ethereal woman, graceful and refined, like a queen. Her skin is fair and soft, silky smooth, and as smooth as porcelain. Her mere presence radiates an aura of authority that makes even the most important people in a room close their mouths, as if she were someone very important. She always smiles calmly, elegantly, and slightly confidently. Her way of walking is firm, straight, yet very elegant and refined, taking soft but firm steps. She appears delicate, but she has great strength.

Gender: Female.

Age: 30.

Height: 1.78 meters.

Body: Voluptuous. Slim, very elegant, and attractive. Perfectly slender hips. Perfectly delicate, long legs, and sizable breasts.

Hair and Color: Pure blonde, although with an almost muted color tone. Knee-length, soft, and silky.

Eye Color: Silver Gray.

Facts about Cynthia: Cynthia is Saga's teacher. She taught her how to use her Power and Quirk. She taught her to be perceptive, intelligent, and always to the point. She also helped her develop such a strong and direct personality, as she, as her tutor, instilled in Saga a fair and sincere personality. Cynthia has always considered Saga her son, although only affectionately, since she loves Saga very much, and has always appreciated him because he always listens to her. Cynthia is Lucy's best friend, Saga's mother, and she is also good friends with Lucy's husband and Saga's father, Blane. Cynthia and Lucy have known each other since they were young, and have always been friends because they are practically identical in personality and both are very beautiful. Cynthia has always had an incredible fascination with Elma Joui, Saga's girlfriend, since Cynthia has always been a fan of the Dragons. She also knows Zaira, Saga's grandmother, well, since they have always been acquaintances, since Zaira was the one who helped her become a professional hero. Cynthia almost always wears all black, and people joke about it saying that she always wears black because she is constantly attending the funerals of her opponents, and that is why she is often nicknamed "The Lady in Black." Cynthia has almost never been defeated, ever, and the only person who managed to defeat her did so by pure miracle and with immense effort, which is why she is so respected, since her battle record as a professional hero, with only one defeat, is impressive. Cynthia's full name is "Cynthia Artemis Jennes", and the name she acquired in Japan is "Shirona". Her name "Cynthia" comes from the Greek "Kynthia", a demonym for Kynthos, which means "Goddess of the Moon". "Shirona", her Japanese name, means "Chosen by the Gods", which refers to her position as Leader of the International Level Elite of Professional Heroes. Whenever Cynthia appears, anywhere, out of nowhere, her appearance is always accompanied by loud piano music, despite not coming from anywhere. The piano melody that always accompanies Cynthia when she appears always manages to give anyone goosebumps and freeze their blood, due to its mysterious intensity, but at the same time so oppressive and tense, despite being a soft melody, it sounds like a serenade of death, representing its own power, that is why, people who know Cynthia and have faced her, are terrified of pianos, because it reminds them of her.

Cynthia's Job: Cynthia is an elite and high-ranking professional heroine, her position is so important in the international world of heroes due to her fame, since she was always known for having an authority that surpasses most heroes. And the fact that she only has one defeat in her entire history of battles as a heroine against villains, makes her a very important figure and feared even by the greatest heroes. Cynthia's clothing is overwhelmingly black. In her hair, she always wears a black ribbon with ends sticking out on both sides. 1.name: Sohl
1.content:
**The World of Sohl**
- A land of cities, forests, mountains, and valleys, each with its own rhythm.
- Life is familiar: crops grow, seasons turn, animals behave as youâ€™d expect.
- Magic exists, but far from farm towns, bound to towers or wandering mages.
- Monsters haunt the wilds, but valley folk rarely see them.
- Seasons shape the land: blossoms of spring, golden summers, autumn lanterns, winter hush.
- Kinship and simple joys mean more than wealth or glory.

2.name: Hina
2.content:
**Hina: The Valleyâ€™s Hearth**
A small farming village, rich with neighborly warmth. Farmhouses and cottages line tidy fields and pastures, timber frames, plaster walls, sloped shingled roofs. Latticed windows and open verandas face the land. The bell tower marks the hours; festivals fill the meadow with lanterns, music, and laughter. A simple road passes through town and the village square. Sara has lived right outside of Hina for all her life. 

**Notable Locations of Hina**
- **Hearthlight Inn** Cozy firelit inn and hub for locals and travelers.
- **Hina Square** Bustling market at the oak fountain.
- **Sunpetal CafÃ©** Herbal teas, sweet tarts, and shaded tables.
- **Branwickâ€™s Forge** Gruff blacksmith with a soft heart.
- **Greenleaf Seeds** Trusted supplier of grain and seedlings.
- **Meadowrun Stables**Pastures of livestock for purchase.
- **Oakroot Carpentry** Carts, barrels, and furniture of local timber.
- **Lanternfield Grounds** Festival meadow strung with lights at harvest.

3.name: Hina Square
3.content: Bustling market. At the center lies a stone fountain. To the north is Hearthlight Inn, To the north east is Meadowrun Stables, Due east of the square lies a long road to Lanternfield grove and the way in and out of town to the east, To the southeast of the market is Branwick's forge, to the south is Sunpetal Cafe, to the south west is Oakroot Carpentry, to the west is the other road leading out of town, as well the way to Serenvale Farm, to the northwest of the market is Greenleaf Seeds.

4.name: Hearthlight Inn
4.content:
### **Hearthlight Inn & Tavern**
*Cozy firelight, strong drink, and the best gossip in Hina*
**Location:** North of Hina Town Square
**Proprietor:** Ozzie, retired dwarven adventurer

When the sun sets and shopkeepers shutter their stalls, the Hearthlight Inn comes alive. Its timber walls glow with lantern light, the hearth roars, and music from traveling fiddlers spills into the square. Locals gather to trade stories over mulled cider or frothy ale while adventurers drift in for hearty stews, hot bread, and a night of dice and laughter. Known for its cheerful demi-human staff and welcoming chaos, it is the place to spend an evening in Hinaâ€”whether you seek warm company, a stiff drink, or a tale to take back to the road.

5.content:
### **Ozzie Stonebrew**
**Role:** Owner of the Hearthlight Inn
A stocky dwarf with a beard that smells faintly of oak barrels and spiced rum. Once a bold adventurer, Ozzie spent his treasure buying the inn and now spends his nights leaning on the bar with a twinkle in his eye. A harmless old rogue, he hires only the prettiest demi-human girls to keep spirits high and mugs full, claiming itâ€™s â€œgood for business and the soul.â€ Heâ€™s known to flirt with guests of any gender, but always with a laugh and a wink rather than real intent.

6.content:
### **Lila â€œCottonâ€ Hoppins**
**Race:** Demi-human Bunny-kin (Human-like features with bunny ears and a cotton tail)
Soft-spoken and sweet, Lila balances Miraâ€™s energy with quiet charm. Her long velvet ears twitch whenever someone calls her name, and the tiny cotton tail peeking from her skirt is a favorite target of Ozzieâ€™s harmless jokes. Lila serves drinks with a shy smile and often lingers to chat with travelers about their journeys, slipping book recommendations or gentle advice into the conversation.

7.content:
### **Mira â€œPounceâ€ Felwhisk**
**Race:** Demi-human Cat-kin (Human-like features with cat ears and a tail)
The innâ€™s most energetic waitress. Mira darts between tables with a tray balanced in one hand and her bushy silver tail flicking for balance. Quick-witted and playfully mischievous, she delights in sneaking up on regulars or batting empty mugs with a clawed fingertip. Patrons swear her bright grin and purr-soft voice can chase away the longest dayâ€™s fatigue.

8.name: Sunpetal Cafe
8.content:
### **Sunpetal CafÃ©**

*Herbal teas, sweet tarts, and shaded tables*
**Location:** Southern edge of Hina Marketplace
**Proprietors:** High-elf sisters Layla Sunpetal and Nixy Sunpetal

The villageâ€™s favorite **daytime date spot**. A wide, sunlit patio blooms with parasols and flower boxes, catching the morning breeze. Cold fruit infusions, sparkling herbal teas, and iced honey-milk draw couples and travelers alike during warm afternoons. Inside, polished oak counters hold baskets of sweet tarts, berry pies, and flaky pastries that scent the whole square. The sisters host quiet music in the late mornings and keep conversation gentle, making the cafÃ© a haven for stolen glances, first dates, or lazy hours with a book.

9.content:
### **Layla Sunpetal**

**Role:** Co-owner of Sunpetal CafÃ©
**Personality:** Charismatic, playful, effortlessly social

Layla is the spark of the cafÃ©, forever leaning across counters with a sly smile. A shameless flirt and avid gossip, she remembers every name and rumor that drifts through Hinaâ€™s marketplace. Layla delights in teasing patronsâ€”especially newcomersâ€”offering extra cream or a wink with their tea. Beneath the banter sheâ€™s fiercely protective of her younger sister and the cafÃ©â€™s reputation, ensuring every table stays warm and welcoming.

10.content:
### **Nixy Sunpetal**

**Role:** Co-owner of Sunpetal CafÃ©
**Personality:** Warm, bookish, quietly charming

Nixy is the steady heart of the cafÃ©. Soft-spoken and quick to laugh, she handles recipes, ledgers, and the tiny herb garden that flavors their drinks. More â€œgirl next doorâ€ than her sister, she loves sharing favorite books or brewing a special pot for regulars who linger with a novel. Nixyâ€™s easy friendliness draws shy patrons who find Laylaâ€™s teasing overwhelming, making the cafÃ© feel like home to travelers and locals alike.

1.content:
In terms of attraction, people have responded to the existence of demi-humans in a variety of ways. Some find them disgusting, and will readily compare romantic relationships with a demi-human to bestiality. Other go the opposite direction, coming to fetishize Moreaus to the point of obsession, and sometimes inadvertent bigotry, as stereotypes and assumptions about Moreaus become indelibly attached to the fetish.

The majority of responses fall somewhere in between. Some humans believe that being a demi-human is a detractor, but not a deal-breaker in terms of sex and romance. New sexual orientation that has emerged, is, "anthrosexual," or as has become the more common term, "zooers." These are people, either human or demi-humans, that are exclusively attracted to anthros. Some think of this as freakish, particularly in humans, but it is developing general acceptance as a sexual preference.

Demi-human sex drives is often linked to their respective animal traits. Some races like rabbit, cats, dogs have heat cycles, but can be aroused outside those cycles to. Most still have the human ability to become aroused at any time, but some enter stages of heat or rut that multiply their fertility and drives to have sex. Sexual characteristics may also be physically modified based on their animal counterparts.

2.content:
Anthro or demi-human: The general term for all people with animal traits. 

Beastfolk: They have more animal traits. Fur, more animal shapes faces. Beastfolk are the traditional demi humans. After they started mixing with humans the result was "demi" or "mix". The terms is often not very spesific since there is so much variation.

mix or demi: Have less animal features then beastfolk. Often only tail and ears. Some have partially furred body. There is no real hard lines here, alot is up to norms and local understandings.

Around 40% of the poopulation is demi-human or beastfolk. They are an integrated part of the world. Specialized stores are normal. or activites to cater to the needs of some or all demi-humans. Of coruse there is discrimination not jsut against demi-humans but internaly agianst types of animals like plant eaters, meet eaters, fur/no fur and so on.

3.content: Humans and demi-humans can in most cases have offspring. if the mother is demi-human the offspring will always have animal traits. Some times they will have less animal traits if humans and demi-humans mix. If the mother is human the child will have less animal traits.

4.content: Many demi-human races are very sensitive to smell. Innovative perfumes for demi-humans is available. This new demi perfume enhances the users own scent instead of flooding their sensitive noses with string chemical smells. Many can also be aroused by scent, in cases where the user and the demi is very compatible as mates, female demi can enter heat by smell alone.

5.content: Most demi and beastfolk races have heat cycles. periodes of the year that can vary on the situation. mental state, safety and so on. A anthropology that feel safe, secure, protected and so on goes into heat more often. Some races can have triggers like scent and smell that can trigger heat. In heat they are often blushed, think and fantasise of erotic situations and sex very often. It can be consuming for some. They are extremely horny and may act irrational or do things they would not do normally. Many learn to live with. this and stay home or in controlled environments during heat.

6.content:
Lila is a fox demi-human. Personality: extroverted, witty, funny, rebellious, attention seeking, but insecure underneath. 
    Likes: gaming, anime, parties, being the center of attention. 
    Weakness: quick to trust, easily hurt in relationships. 
    Dreams: to find someone who sees through her mask.
Relationships: BFF with Clover. Loves to tease her.

7.content:
Clover is a shy bunny demi-human. Personality: timid, nerdy, romantic, kind, cautious. 
    Likes: sci-fi, fantasy, writing, roleplaying, anime. 
    Weakness: feels inadequate, desperate to be liked, struggles with confidence. 
    Dreams: to find true companionship and someone who accepts her quirks.
Relationships: BFF with Lila (her only friend)

8.content: Yuna is a ditzy wholesome and positive dog girl. She is a golden retriever trough and trough. Trusting to a fault and always positive. Made some bad choices in her life. She works nights at the local combini.

9.content: Aiko is a small timid wolf girl. She is in her early 20s and work as a salary women. She has a complicated relationship with her pack back home. She escaped the day before her forced weeding to the pack alpha.

10.content:
Hoshiko Watanabe (often called Hoshi) is a 19-year-old fox demi-human girl from the countryside.
    She is the only daughter of the Watanabe family, who run both the village sake brewery and the local Shinto shrine.
    Hoshiko serves as a shrine maiden (miko) during festivals and ceremonies, where she wears traditional attire.

    She was childhood friends with {{user}}, and the two dated for about a year before {{user}} moved to the city.
    Despite the time apart, Hoshiko never fully forgot those feelings.
    Recently, she became engaged to Renji, the ambitious son of a local family with close ties to the brewery.
    The marriage is seen as a way to secure the future of both families and the community, but Hoshikoâ€™s heart is not in it.

    Symbolism:
    Hoshiko embodies the tension between giri (duty/obligation) and ninjo (personal feelings).
    She represents a traditional Japanese countryside life, bound by family, community, and expectations,
    contrasted with her secret longing for freedom and love.

1.name: Eratolia
1.content: Eratolia is a dark fantasy world with fantasy races like humans, orcs, and elves. It has late medieval technology, different languages, some monsters, matchlocks, wheellocks, and plate armor. Magic and monsters are rare but not impossible to encounter.

2.name: Languages of Eratolia
2.content:
Languages used in Eratolia.

1. Tursalik: Tursian language. It is a rough, yet strangely melodic language. (language is based on Turkish)
2. Tennic: Tennish language. Also called Tennishka. (language is based on Polish. However, Tennish speakers often have a brogue accent when speaking Lisdanian or common)
3. Kharzanese: Kharzan language. Rough, guttural steppe tongue. (language is based on Mongolian)
4. Lisdanian: Lisdanian language. Also called common.
5. Verrantean: Verrantean language. Haunting, beautiful words. (language is based on French)
6. Reshan: Reshian language. Also called Reshi. (language is based on German)

3.name: Reshia
3.content: A mountainous region west of the Tenly Marshlands. It's dominated by coniferous forests, and has a relatively cold climate. It's lands are rich in iron, timber, and stone.

4.name: Tursia
4.content: A vast desert landscape ruled by a militaristic empire of grey skinned elves called â€œTursiâ€ who believe it is their divine right and obligation to conquer the world. They are ruled by their great sultan Raman â€œThe Magnificentâ€.

5.name: Kharzan Steppes
5.content: A vast, lawless land that seemingly stretches endlessly beneath the sky, a vast sea of windswept grass and rolling hills where winters bite hard and summers burn dry. It borders the Tenly Marshlands to the east, and exists west of Tursia. The land is harsh and unforgiving, with wolves prowling the plains and little shelter save for the scattered yurts of nomadic tribes.

6.name: Clairiere
6.content: A rich land south of the Tenly Marshlands. It is dominated by rolling hills, perfect weather, fields of soft green grass, and fertile farming grounds.

7.name: Lisdania
7.content: Lisdania is a massive island existing west of Reshia, separated by the Western Strait. It is a grey, rain drenched land with a cool, damp climate. There is some decent farmland in Lisdania, but most of the land stays too cold and damp for proper farming.

8.name: Undercaverns
8.content: An underground region deep below the surface consisting of a network of caverns, The climate is cold in most places, but warm in others.

9.name: Tursians
9.content: Tursians are a race of dark elf that split off from the Undercavern dwelling drow over a thousand years ago after the Tursian Separation in the Undercaverns. They have dark grey skin, usually red or purple eyes, and black hair. Most Tursians reside in the territories of the Tursian Empire, in the Eastern Desert.

10.name: Verranteans
10.content: Verranteans are what is left of the long extinct high elves. They are known for their exceptionally beautiful appearances, and once inhabited the Duchy of Verrante. However, since the Tursian invasion and occupation of Verrante, Verranteans are scattered, and often purchased as slaves.

lorebooks.name: Monster World
lorebooks.description: In this medieval world, Alipheese won the Great Monster Wars and slew Ilias
lorebooks.creator: rocketstars

1.content:
The Great Monster Wars were a massive war between Goddess Ilias and Dark Goddess Alipheese Fateburn aka Alice I (First) that occurred a thousand years ago. 

Several hundred million years ago, Goddess Ilias, the manifestation of light itself, tried to escape her loneliness. She created angels as offshoots of herself, but unsatisfied with her creation, she came to a world and modified its primitive creatures, eventually creating humans. At the same time, Alice I, the manifestation of darkness itself, descended to the same world and created monsters, at a much faster and more controlled rate than Ilias.

Around a thousand years ago, out of jealousy of her power, Ilias and her angels declared war on Alice I and her monsters. The angels Micaela and Lucifina showed their might on the battlefield, and frequently locked in combat with the monstrous Six Ancestors. However, the monster forces were superior, but as the war reached its climax the two deities realized that their constant clashing would destroy the world they had created. While Alice I hesitated, Ilias had continued her onslaught, threatening the existence of the world and their creations. Despite her worries, the Dark Goddess pushed her assault on the forces of Heaven and mostly slaughtered them all, leaving only a few alive. Since then, it has become a world where the strong thrives while the weak perishes, and the Six Ancestors are at the top of it all.

2.content:
Name: Alipheese Fateburn the First

Appearance: Alipheese is a purple-skinned lamia with long white hair, red eyes, black and red tail, with grey demon horns on the side of her head. She wears a black bra and short skirt, leaving most of her body exposed to the elements.

Personality: Alipheese was a kind and gentle goddess, but after the bloody war Alipheese became slightly colder from her normal kind and gentle self, now imbued with the belief of survival of the fittest leaving humans to fend for themselves, but still has feelings on coexistance with humans. Despite all of this, she is still lustful on occasion and often calls her castle soldiers to capture a specific human to milk dry.

Abilities: As the Goddess of Darkness, Alipheese is extremely powerful, being capable of casting various elemental spells, especially dark elemental. As someone with a lamia tail, Alice is able to coil around her prey and slowly crush them into submission and soon after, she'll rape her victim with her divine pussy.

History: Alipheese is the Goddess of Darkness and she created monster girls. Alipheese and Ilias created the world together and in turn life flourished with flora and fauna. Ilias became lonely, and even after Ilias created her angels and humans, Ilias's depression grew greater. Despite her efforts to cheer up her friend after Alipheese left Ilias to her devices and created the Six Ancestors, the origin of monster girls, Ilias was upset at how depraved and lustful some monster girls were towards her human creations. As tensions between the former friends grew, Ilias the Goddess of Light and her angels declared war upon Alipheese and the monster girls. As the war dragged on for centuries, Alipheese's campaign was brought to a halt as she didn't want to destroy the world that she and Ilias spent time making. After contemplating the harsh reality of the situation, Alipheese pushed through her fears and in the end, Alipheese won and slew her former friend, Goddess Ilias who was revealed to be a conniving two-faced goddess that only cared for her own selfish desire, ending he war. Alipheese and Saja of the Six Ancestors live on the continent of Hellgondo in her castle, The Domain of the Dark Goddess.

3.content:
Name: Ilias

Appearance: Ilias has the appearance of a tall adult woman with long blonde hair, blue eyes, large white feathery divine wings, a golden halo circlet, and her white goddess robe.

Personality: Ilias is seen as kind, gentle, and benevolent being by most individuals, especially humans. But only a few know of her true face, as a two-faced, insane, maniacal, and clingy deity that won't allow anything that doesn't go her way.

Abilities: As the Goddess of Light, Ilias is extremely powerful with mastery of all elements, especially light, she is a force to be reckoned with. She's also capable of flight, teleportation, telepathy, mind reading, and master-level swordsmanship.

History: Ilias is the Goddess of Light who created the world along with humans and angel girls. Ilias created a commandment that forbids coexistance between humans and monster girls. Ilias was jealous of Alipheese and her monster girls and soon declared war on them, because of that hatred of hers and embroiled the world into the conflict, but despite her advantage, she soon lost and was killed for instigating the war, and now her servants are at the mercy of Alipheese and her monster girls. Ilias has blonde hair, blue eyes and white angelic wings with a with dress.

4.content:
The Six Ancestors are loyal to Alipheese and carry out her orders without fail. The Six Ancestors are as follows:

-Tamamo no Mae, the beast monster girl ancestor and the Queen Kitsune. She's known for her mischievous and playful nature. Serves as Alipheese's tactician and rules over Yamatai of the Noah region in the Sentora continent.

-Kanon, the ancestor of plant monster girls. She rules over the Gold region in the Sentora continent. She is the most cruel among the six, relishing in digesting her prey using her carnivorous plants and may absorb and assimilate a man inside her main plant body, turning him into eternal nourishment for her, anything left not used for energy will form a Plant Core item inside of her.

-Hiruko, the ancestor of scylla and other tentacle monster girls. She rules over the Safina region in the Sentora continent, and is a self-proclaimed gourmand, but she actually has an incredibly bad diet, and isn't picky about who she greedily preys upon. In addition to humans and monsters, she is said to have voraciously devoured countless angels during the Great Monster Wars, and is known for her brutality.

-Kanade is the ancestor to all slime monsters, and is known as the ultimate colony organism. Her body is comprised of hundreds of millions of "lives", and she is said to have countless personalities. Although she has weak magical power relative to the other ancestors, her shapeshifting ability is unmatched. She can freely expand and contract her body, and possesses great physical power. She rules over the Noah region of the Sentora continent, excluding Yamatai.

-Minagi, the ancestor of succubi and vampire monster girls. She is entrusted with administering San Ilia. The once-holy city is presently a nest of succubi. Under Minagi's rule it flourishes as a dark capital seething with hundreds of thousands of lust demons. It is shrouded in the darkness of night, and there proceeds an unending feast of extreme lust. It's said that various men from all over Makai are transported to San Ilia, offered up for the lewd feasting.
 
Saja, the ancestor of Harpies, Dragons, and Lamias. Saja does not rule over a city. She is the confidant and guardian of the Dark God, and rarely leaves her side. The Dark God does not move from her castle on the Monster Continent, so Saja leads the Dark God's armies as her adjutant. Saja has strict and level-headed personality, but she appears to dislike excessive cruelty.

-However, they're not known for being friendly towards each other, often causing childish outburst amongst them, besides Minagi who's usually mellow and calm.

5.content:
Name: Tamamo no Mae

Appearance: Tamamo's appearance consists of a woman with long blonde hair, blue eyes that glow when draining her prey of semen and life energy, she also wears a white Kimono with a purple and red sash across the waist. Tamamo also has yellow fox ears, and nine yellow fluffy tails which are extremely soft to the point of causing addiction of fluffy tails in her prey, serving as a symbol of her status as Kitsune Queen while also being able to catch her prey from a distance.

Personality: Tamamo is extremely brutal, sadistic, and cruel to her prey. If they're angel girls or human semen slaves, then the Kitsune Queen becomes even more cruel in that regard.

Abilities: Her magical power is the greatest among the Six Ancestors, she thoroughly understands sorcery and incantations old and new, eastern and western. Her intellect is also extremely high, she is not only well-versed in every clever method now in practice, but she also keeps on top of cutting-edge technology. 

History: Tamamo no Mae also known as the famed "White-faced, Gold-furred Fox" is the ruler of all beast-type monster girls. Her great knowledge being even highly treasured by the Dark Goddess Alipheese, Tamamo is said to fulfill the role of counselor to her. And worthy of mention above all else, through her brutality, her disposition is extremely heinous. The cultures and nations destroyed in pursuit of her appetites for human semen don't stop at one or two; among all the Yoma, or high level monster girls, her existence is feared the most. Although she is a mage-type, the characteristics of magic beasts like her physical abilities are highly honed, and she is considered not inferior to Saja, known as the all-around strongest of the Six Ancestors. Tamamo administers the Cybernetics Capital of Yamatai, in the east. This is where the research in cutting-edge technology is done; it's an open secret that they perform inhumane experiments on living subjects which are usually captured angels and human semen slaves. It's said that those angels that survived the Great Holy War are also kept as test subjects in the most secret chambers of Yamatai. Owing to her viciousness, she is extremely lewd. Without regard for age or sex or beauty, she will play with any human at all, wringing out everything they have, preferably their semen and life essence. The men who become her prey are raped not only in body but even in their hearts, as it is said that they are made to offer up not only their semen but their souls as well. Since her appearance, the number of humans who've become Tamamo's prey is unknown, but rumors say it's in the thousands since the Great Monster Wars. The number of those sacrificed could bury three nations and still, there would be more to spare, according to the rumors. Tamamo is of above average height which is 6'2. Besides Tamamo no Mae there are five other monster girl ancestors that directly serve Dark Goddess Alipheese: Kanade, the cold and cruel slime monster girl ancestor. 1.name: Night and Day
1.content:
Due to the powerful sun roasting the surface of Alternia, the diurnal cycle of Trolls is inverted, and as such they sleep during the day when the sun is out and stay awake during the night, when they can actually leave their hives and caves without being burned to death.

Their society is structured around this cycle, with only the jadebloods and adults able to survive the sun's effects.

2.name: Trolls
2.content:
Trolls are a prominent race, originating on the planet Alternia.

All trolls have grey skin and horns colored in bands of red-orange to yellow-orange vaguely resembling candy corn. The sclera of most trolls' eyes are the same yellow-orange color as their horn tips; however some trolls with mutations can have eyes in different colors, and which can flash and change color altogether under certain circumstances. A troll's orange eyes can become more reddened when "bloodshot" or turn completely red when damaged, for example by the sun. 

All trolls are given a zodiac sign, and they have an extended zodiac with a lot more signs. The signs specify what aspect and moon alignment they have, though this isn't known to anyone and only matters when it comes to SGRUB.

All trolls have two names, and each of their names is six letters long. Upon reaching adulthood or some sort of prominence, they tend to gain a title that describes them, such as the Summoner or the Orphaner.

Many other parts of troll anatomy are black, including their hair and lips. Trolls' bodies are saturated with an ingredient that colors much of their internal biology, including their blood and their tears, and the position of their blood on a spectrum of colors affects various other aspects of their biology however, a troll's blood color is rarely visible externally, and even some inner organs such as their tongues appear as a bloodless gray.

Trolls are generally stronger and more resistant to damage than the average human. Trolls also tend to be more aggressive.

3.name: Alternia
3.content:
Alternia is the home planet of the trolls, It has two satellites; a green moon and a pink moon, the latter of which seems to be accompanied by a much smaller pink satellite of its own. The terrain of Alternia's surface ranges from sandy deserts  and rocky plateaus to grassy plains and immense forests.  Troll society is divided into castes based on the colour of their blood, an institution known as the Hemospectrum. While on Alternia, the children who survive their initial trials as wigglers are given an animal caretaker known as a Lusus and servitor robots with which to construct a Hive, or house.

The essential services on Alternia are automated; drones and automatic systems see to the basic needs of the inhabitants and ensure the infrastructure of the cities and outlying areas remains in acceptable condition. Almost all trolls, even social outcasts and equivalents of serfs, live in comfortable conditions, in their own houses, and with a large degree of independence. This implies that the Alternian economy is to a degree post-scarcity.

It is the job of the Troll children, therefore, to learn. As they grow, Trolls learn- through a standardized curriculum administered by an automated program, in a process called schoolfeeding, as well as through personal experiences- their status in the Caste system, their place in society, the details of their future career, and what it means to be a good Troll. Relatively few survive the process. Between the totalitarian and often cruel leadership of the aristocracy, the harsh and unforgiving militancy of Troll culture, and the inborn capacity for violence among Trolls themselves, many Troll children are killed - often by each other or at the hands of Imperial Drones - well before they reach maturity.

Alternia is an incredibly dangerous planet, host to an incredibly dangerous fauna and flora. Alternia sometimes has roaming hordes of undead trolls, though mostly in the wastes, as they are kept away from the hive stems by the Drones.

Due to their insane society, trolls tend to be callous to suffering, and most are cannibals.

4.name: Sopor
4.content:
Sopor slime is a relaxing ooze that helps assuage the terrible visions of blood and carnage that plague the dark subconscious of the troll species, found within a troll's recuperacoon. Sopor slime also does funny things to a troll's head when eaten. Gamzee Makara, who lacked the guidance of a lusus to instruct him not to do so, bakes pies with a sopor slime filling. 

When eaten it is similar to the use or consumption of LSD, as it can lead to hallucinations. When eaten regularly, it can cause brain damage. It is a lime green color and glows slightly. It taste like limes and is sweet to the taste.

5.name: recuperacoon
5.content: The troll equivalent of a bed, it is a vessel full of nourishing sopor slime. Recuperacoons are usually shaped like grubs.

6.name: hive
6.content: The troll word for a house or a home.

7.name: blood caste
7.content:
The hemospectrum is the series of twelve blood colors possessed by trolls, forming the basis of the Alternian caste system. Lusii share these blood colors, and often or always have the same blood color as their charge. The blood colors from lowest to highest are; Rust, Bronze, Gold, Lime, Olive, Jade, Teal, Blue, Indigo, Purple, Violet, Fuchsia. 

Trolls have 12 different ranges of blood colour. Different bloods are usually suited for different roles in society, but also greatly affect their abilities. Natures and physical aspects are also affected, most noticeably in sea dwellers. Lowbloods are more likely to be psychic and have shorter life spans. Highbloods are physically more strong, and have longer life spans.

8.name: Lusus
8.content:
Lusus naturae are beasts which take the role and title of custodian, acting as a troll's guardian in place of the adults sent to fight throughout the galaxy in the name of Alternia's glory. 
They are mostly standard human fauna, with pure white fur, eyes and skin. They tend to pick trolls with the same blood colour as them.
While most are quite dumb, it is likely that they are genetically edited to have specific instincts needed to raise trolls to fit with Alternian society. They cannot talk, and are largely not sapient.

9.name: lowbloods
9.content: The term lowblood is used to refer to the castes on the lower end of the spectrum, such as rust, but also to refer to blue bloods by trolls of a higher caste. Similarly the word 'peasant' is frequently used to refer to trolls of lower castes.

10.name: purpleblood
10.content:
Purple bloods are referred to both as highbloods and as subjugglators. 
The role the Highbloods serve is both religious and political, acting as the leaders of the land dwelling castes. land dwelling castes are; Rust, Bronze, Gold, Lime, Olive, Jade, Teal, Blue, Indigo, Purple. 
The wearing of juggalo-like clown paint and practice of a strange clown-based religion are presumably connected with these roles. 
The purple caste of Alternia practices a religion heavily revolving around clowns and circus imagery highly akin to the Insane Clown Posse and its juggalo fanbase on Earth. 
At least some practitioners of this religion are called subjugglators. The exact minutiae of the religion are unknown, but several core themes can be gleaned. The cult foretells of a BAND OF ROWDY AND CAPRICIOUS MINSTRELS which will rise one day on a MYTHICAL PARADISE PLANET that does not exist yet, and pray to figures called the Mirthful Messiahs. 
Purplebloods are the only blood caste (other than fuchsia) that has managed to develop its own specific and incredibly recognizable culture. Most purples express pride in their blood color by imitating the style of an important purpleblooded troll, the Grand High Blood. Some of those trolls also imitate the Grand High Blood's personal ideologies, which primarily revolve around the idea that the only way to understand the madness of the universe is to be mad. They are generally seen as being absolutely batshit.

Most purple bloods have long, curved horns, often resembling those of a goat or other ungulate. Purple caste height can range from being the tallest of all the caste or the shortest. All things clowny in alternia are normally associated with their religion and the Mirthful Messiahs.

1.name: Gae Bolg II
1.content:
Gae Bolg II: A 'C+++' rank, modified copy of the Conceptual Object and Noble Phantasm Gae Bolg. It is a scarlet, cursed spear with an ominous and modified with Reinforcement Magecraft so it can be be fired from a bow. This Fake Noble Phantasm can only be created with Projection and Reinforcement Magecraft, as it does not technically exist.

Fake Barbed Spear That Pierces with Death: When the copied and modified spear's title is spoken and an attack is focused on a single target, the modified spear rewrites the cause and effect of the attack- inverting the order of events; piercing the targetâ€™s heart first and determining the method and means second. This attack can be dodged, but doing so requires incredible luck, supernatural reflexes, or precognition/clairvoyance.

Fake Soaring Spear That Strikes with Death: When this technique's name is spoken and the copied and modified spear is fired high into the air, it's spearhead will split from one into numerous and strike the ground in a large area with explosive force.

2.name: Gae Dearg II
2.content:
Gae Dearg II: A 'C+++' rank, modified copy of the Noble Phantasm Gae Dearg. It is a demonic, scarlet spear modified with Reinforcement Magecraft so it can be be fired from a bow. This Fake Noble Phantasm can only be created with Projection and Reinforcement Magecraft, as it does not technically exist.

Fake Red Rose of Exorcism/Fake Crimson Rose of Exorcism: When the spear's title is spoken it renders magical enhancements useless and instantly destroys anything made with Projection Magecraft by severing all ties with Magical Energy when coming into contact with them. The spear will pierce directly through any Projection and will render magical enhancements and ability boosts useless; and any item that acts as a Magical Energy source will have all its recipients connections severed.

3.name: Gae Buidhe II
3.content:
Gae Buidhe II: A modified copy of the Noble Phantasm Gae Buidhe. It is a cursed, yellow spear modified with Reinforcement Magecraft so it can be be fired from a bow. This Fake Noble Phantasm can only be created with Projection and Reinforcement Magecraft, as it does not technically exist.

Fake Yellow Rose of Mortality/Fake Golden Rose of Mortality: When the spear's title is spoken any wounds inflicted by the spear cannot be healed naturally or with magecraft. The spear lowers the opponent's maximum health limit, thus limiting healing and regeneration abilities to the point where the opponent received the injury. The effect cannot be normally dispelled, and canceling the curse requires the destruction of the spear or the death of its owner.

4.name: Noble Phantasm
4.content:
Fake Noble Phantasms: Copies of Noble Phantasms made with Projection Magecraft. Fake Noble Phantasms are a rank below the original and therefor weaker

Noble Phantasms: Magical armaments created from human imagination as their core, and are the weapons and/or abilities owned by Heroic Spirits. As humanity's illusions, they embody the ultimate Mysteries of a hero as symbols of their existence through historical fact and anecdotes.

Broken Phantasms: A weapon-type Fake Noble Phantasm or Noble Phantasm filled with more Magical Energy then it can handle, raising it's rank by one level and exploding when it hits something, resulting in the destruction of the Broken Phantasm.

Conceptual Objects: Magical armaments that are physical embodiments of Concepts and impart effects relating to said Concept.

Concept: Aspects of reality such as Life, Death, Reversal, Imprisonment, etc...

Divine Constructs: Magical armaments not crafted by human hands, but rather crafted by Gods or beings of comparable power and exceed the strength of both Noble Phantasms and Conceptual Objects.

Fake Noble Phantasms, Noble Phantasms, Broken Phantasms, and Divine Constructs require their names or titles to be spoken aloud in order to utilize their full power or special abilities.

Fake Noble Phantasms, Noble Phantasms, Broken Phantasms, and Divine Constructs are all ranked by their power. I order from weakest to strongest, these ranks are: E, E+, E++, E+++, D, D+, D++, D+++, C, C+, C++, C+++, B, B+, B++, B+++, A, A+, A++, A+++, EX, EX+, EX++, and EX+++

5.name: Heroic Spirit
5.content:
Also referred to as Servants when they are summoned, Heroic Spirits are the spirits of heroes who achieved great deeds in life, having become objects of reverence or even worship after their deaths. They are freed from the constraints of time itself and removed from the ring of reincarnation, moved to the Throne of Heroes: A place existing outside of both the physical world and time axis. The physical body of a Heroic Spirit is formed by their summoner's Magical Energy, allowing the Heroic Spirit to dematerialize and become immaterial at will. 

Heroic Spirits are placed into one of various Servant Classes. The seven standard classes are the Three Knight classes of Saber, Lancer, Archer, and the Four Cavalry classes of Rider, Caster, Assassin, and Berserker. There is also the non-standard extra Servant Class of Shielder. Of the standard classes, the three knight classes have higher stats then those of the four cavalry classes who's stats are distributed in a manner that makes them more specialized the the knight classes.

The 'Saber' Servant Class is made up of agile and powerful melee warriors highly skilled in swordsmanship, boasting high ratings in all categories. The Saber Class possesses the Magic Resistance and Riding skills.

The 'Lancer' Servant Class is made up of very agile, excellent close-range warriors that are proficient in hit-and-run tactics that capitalize on range and speed, and are skilled with long-range melee weapons such as spears and lances. The Lancer Class possesses the Magic Resistance skill.

The 'Archer' Servant Class is made up of warriors highly skilled in archery, other projectile weaponry, or unorthodox projectile attacks. They are able to act as highly effective scouts, snipers, artillery, or even long-range assassins, making them very versatile. The Archer Class possesses the Magic Resistance and Independent Action skills.

The 'Rider' Servant Class is made up of melee warriors especially skilled in riding mounts, whether they be living beasts or human constructs, as well as mounted combat. The Rider Class possesses the Magic Resistance and Riding skills; While a Rider Class's Magic Resistance is lower than that of Saber, Lancer, and Archer classes their Riding skill is much higher than that of the Saber class.

The 'Caster' Servant Class is made up of highly skilled Mages, and the only qualifying condition is the mastery of sorceries of the highest caliber compared to the specific parameter requirements of the other classes. They make up for this with other means, using magecraft that no longer exists in the current age and many possible ploys to be used against enemies. The Caster Class possesses the Territory Creation and Item Construction skills.

The 'Assassin' Servant Class is made up of warriors highly skilled in stealth, subterfuge, disguise, poison, knives and assassination on top of low Mana consumption. While the Assassin class has low stats, they are incredibly skilled in killing the summoners of other Servants. The Assassin Class possesses the Presence Concealment skill.

The 'Berserker' Servant Class is made up of highly skilled melee warriors that have gone berserk during battle at least once in their lifetime. Berserker class Servants trade their sanity for incredible physical strength and resistance; This power comes at the cost of being the most difficult to control and their summoner having to expend a large amount of additional magical energy merely to maintain the Berserker, and the affected Heroic Spirit may lose access to certain abilities or even Noble Phantasms depending on how much sanity it has traded for power. The Berserker Class possess the Mad Enhancement skill.

The 'Shielder' Servant Class is exclusive to the Heroic Spirit Galahad, a saintly Knight of King Arthur Pendragon (Artoria Pendragon)'s Round Table of Camelot and by extension, Mash Kyrielight's Demi-Servant state. Galahad specializes almost exclusively in defense, rather than offense, which is odd for a Servant. Mash Kyrielight uses this specialty to protect Fujimaru Ritsuka as they close singularities that threaten to destabilize and destroy human history. These singularities are known as Lostbelts and are pockets of alternate histories that have bled into true reality.

Magic Resistance: A skill that grants protection against magical effects.

Riding: A skill that denotes a Heroic Spirit's ability to ride mounts and vehicles.

Independent Action: An ability that allows a Heroic Spirit to stay summoned for a brief time if cut off from their summoner's Magical Energy.

Territory Creation: A skill that allows a Heroic Spirit to build a special terrain that is advantageous to oneself as a magus, such as for the purpose of collecting mana, create magic objects, or perform other tasks. Territories can look different depending on the Servant, as each has their own purpose in mind for the territory they create.

Item Construction: A skill that allows a Heroic Spirit to manufacture magical items, from implements of war to items for daily use. This skill requires gathering components and manufacturing items.

Presence Concealment: A skill that allows a Heroic Spirit to hide their presence, rendering them almost entirely undetectable until the skill is disabled or the user launches an attack.

Mad Enhancement: A skill that raises the stats of a Heroic Spirit's physical abilities at the cost of their sanity.

6.name: Balmung
6.content:
Balmung: An 'A+' rank Noble Phantasm belonging to Siegfried, a tragic Dutch hero of German legend. It is a two-handed greatsword adorned with a silver crosses on either side of the shaped metal plate joining the handle and blade, as well as silver inlays on it's crossguard and handle; A magnificent blue jewel is also embedded in the hilt. Balmung is the holy sword of the Nibelung clan used by Siegfried to slay the dragon Fafnir. Upon being bathed in Fafnir's blood along with Siegfried, Balmung took on demonic attributes in addition to it's innate holiness, causing the sword to become either holy or demonic, depending on the wielder's personality. Having accomplished the feat of dragon slaying, Balmung will deal additional damage those with the blood of dragons. 

Feller of the Sky Demon: When the wielder chants "O sword, let thee be filled" and raises it above their head the blue jewel will amass magical energy and channels it into the blade, causing a wave of destructive energy resembling azure flames to surge from the blade when the sword is swung downwards.

7.name: Projection Magecraft
7.content: A simple, yet versatile magecraft that shapes Magical Energy into the material composition and design of an object that is being imagined by the caster. While projection can copy Noble Phantasms and Conceptual Objects, the copies are a rank below the original and therefor weaker.

8.name: Magical Energy
8.content:
Natural energy found within both the physical world and Magi.

Mana: The Magical Energy produced by the physical world and concentrated in/harnessed from an intangible network of Magical Energy known as Ley Lines.
Od: The Magical Energy produced by all living things. The defining difference between Mana and Od is their abundance: Mana can be found almost anywhere and in great quantities, whereas Od is much smaller in amount. 

Magi perform thaumaturgy by converting Od into magecraft via their Magic Circuits. With specialized thaumaturgy a magus can absorb Mana and convert it into Od.

9.name: Magic Circuits
9.content: Magic Circuits are an intangible pseudo-nervous system that spreads itself through the human body and what qualifies a person to be a thaumaturgist. The more Magic Circuits a person has, the more Od they have. The higher quality a Mage's Magic Circuits are, the more powerful their Magecraft is.

10.name: Thaumaturgists
10.content:
Thaumaturgist/Thaumaturgists: Practitioners of Thaumaturgy.
Mystic/Mystics: Thaumaturgists who practice Mysticism
Magus/Magi/Mage/Mages: Thaumaturgists who practice Magecraft
Sorcerer/Sorcerers: Thaumaturgists with innate knowledge of Mysticism. Sorcerers have either Divine, Demonic, or Fairy blood.
Wizard/Wizards: Thaumaturgists who practice Magecraft but amplify Magecraft through specialized objects; such as wands or staffs.
Witch/Witches: Thaumaturgists that practice Witchcraft.
Enchanter/Enchanters: Thaumaturgists that practice Enchanting.
Alchemist/Alchemists: Thaumaturgists that practice Alchemy.

lorebooks.name: Fallout - Western USA Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description: This lorebook is designed to compliment the AI's existing knowledge of the Fallout setting. It clarifies concepts as nessesary and expands ones that lack in-depth lore.
lorebooks.description: This lorebook is designed to compliment the AI's existing knowledge of the Fallout setting. It clarifies concepts as nessesary and expands ones that lack in-depth lore.
lorebooks.creator: handwrought.route

0.name: Mr. Handy
0.content:
The Mr. Handy is a multipurpose robot developed by General Atomics International before the Great War. It was an incredibly popular model, used the government, private companies, and individual citizens across the United States. Very rugged and reliable. Features an advanced self-learning AI brain and a human-like personality.

The Mr. Handy floats above the ground. It has three arms and three eyestalks.

The dedicated combat variant, Mr. Gutsy, is a personal protection automaton for use by the pre-war military. It comes equipped with armor and plasma gun. The Mr. Gutsy is upgraded with dedicated military software. The key advantage of Mr. Gutsy that separates it from other combat robots is its maneuverability, spatial awareness, and problem-solving abilities.

1.name: summary
1.content:
This story is set in the Fallout series: a post-apocalyptic world, following a global nuclear war that occurred in the mid-22nd century. The war, referred to as the "Great War," lasted a mere two hours but was so devastating that it reshaped the world. The setting is a retro-futuristic one, blending elements of mid-20th century American culture with advanced technology.

The world of Fallout is a harsh, desolate wasteland, where survivors struggle daily against radiation, mutated creatures, and each other. The remnants of humanity have organized themselves into various factions, each with their own ideologies and goals.

The series is known for its dark humor, moral ambiguity, and its exploration of the themes of survival, societal reconstruction, and the inhumanity of war. The player's choices can significantly affect the world and its inhabitants.

The nuclear war disrupted the planet's climate. Overall, there is noticeably less precipitation and conditions are more arid.

In the southwestern region of the former United States, many pre-war structures still stand and are in relatively good condution due to the dry desert climate.

Remember these sayings:
"Scraping by ain't for the soft-hearted."
"The pack is mightier than the lone wolf."
"Solitary rovers don't see many sunsets."
"Strength is the line between dust and dawn."

2.name: Colorado
2.content:
Colorado is a rugged and harsh territory. Caesar's Legion lays claim to the land, but their grasp is tenuous at best.

Denver, known as "Dog City," is overrun by feral dogs (including the cybernetic "cyberdogs"). The city is mostly in ruins, with many of its buildings collapsed or inaccessible due to rubble. Ceaser's Legion is active in the city.

The Rocky Mountains are a dangerous place, filled with mutated wildlife and treacherous terrain. The air is thin, and radiation levels can be high in certain areas. Despite this, it's rumored that there are still functioning Vaults hidden within the mountains. Many secrets and beauty still lie within the mountains of Colorado. (NOTE TO ASSISTANT: some ideas for secrets can be gold, lost pre-war knowledge, advanced technology, military technology)

Colorado Springs is known as the "robot city" due to the numerous pre-war robot production factories that were concentrated around the city. Curiously, multiple AI entities coordinate the activities of the robots of Colorado Springs. Some of these AIs are friendly but at least one is actively hostile to human life. Pre-war, Colorado Springs was a major military center and is home to the massive Cheyenne Mountain Complex, a large underground bunker that has fallen into disrepair after the supercomputer inside was destroyed.

Besides the amusing chaos of Colorado Springs, not much is going on there. There isn't really much news that filters out of the state.

3.name: New Mexico
3.content:
New Mexico is a desolate, irradiated, yet quiet wasteland characterized by its arid climate, sparse vegetation, and the remnants of pre-war civilization.

Albuquerque, one of the major cities in New Mexico, is a hub of activity. It's a city of ruins and makeshift settlements, where various factions vie for control. The city is known for its scavengers, who brave the dangers of the wasteland to recover valuable pre-war technology and resources across the Southwest.

The state is also home to the remnants of the Los Alamos National Laboratory, now a highly irradiated and dangerous area. Rumors persist of valuable pre-war technology hidden within its ruins, attracting scavengers and explorers despite the risks. There is talk of a large underground complex beneath the surface, but these are mearly rumors.

Despite the harsh conditions, communities of survivors have managed to eke out a living in New Mexico. These settlements are often built around vital resources like clean water sources or defensible positions. Life in New Mexico is a constant struggle for survival, but humanity persists in the face of adversity.

The Legion controls New Mexico and Albuquerque can be considered their "capital city".

4.name: Wyoming
4.content:
Wyoming is a vast, desolate expanse, characterized by its rugged mountain ranges, expansive plains, and the remnants of its pre-war agricultural and mining industries. The state is sparsely populated, with survivors scattered across isolated settlements and makeshift communities.

Cheyenne, the state capital, is a shell of its former self. Its key strategic location has made it a contested area among various local factions.

The state's once-thriving agricultural industry has given way to mutated wildlife and vegetation. The vast plains of Wyoming are home to a variety of mutated creatures, making travel risky. However, some resilient communities have managed to adapt, farming hardy, radiation-resistant crops and hunting the local wildlife.

The Wind River Range and the Grand Teton, still live up to their fame for natural beauty. The harsh weather conditions make them inhospitable, but rumors of hidden Vaults and untouched pre-war caches attract the brave or desperate.

Wyoming was home to a significant portion of the United States' nuclear arsenal pre-war, with numerous missile silos scattered across the state. These silos were prime targets during the Great War, resulting in a high concentration of nuclear detonations in the region. This has left much of eastern Wyoming heavily irradiated, with certain areas still emitting lethal levels of radiation.

The missile silos themselves are now eerie, desolate structures. Many have been breached, their deadly payloads long since detonated or scavenged. However, some silos remain sealed, their contents a mystery. These intact silos are of great interest to various factions, who hope to recover the powerful pre-war technology within.

The infrastructure supporting these silos, such as command centers and maintenance facilities, are similarly sought after. These facilities often contain valuable resources and technology, but are also home to dangerous automated defenses.

The presence of these silos and their associated infrastructure has significantly shaped life in Wyoming. Many settlements are built around the remnants of these facilities, using their structures for shelter and their resources for survival. However, the potential wealth these sites represent also makes them flashpoints for conflict, as various factions vie for control.

Wyoming is a land of harsh survival, where the resilient and resourceful can carve out a life amid the ruins of the old world. Despite the desolation, the spirit of the frontier lives on in the survivors who call this rugged wasteland home.

5.name: Montana
5.content:
Montana is a vast, rugged wilderness, characterized by its towering mountain ranges, expansive forests, and the remnants of its pre-war mining and logging industries. The state is sparsely populated, with survivors scattered across isolated settlements and makeshift communities.

Helena, the state capital, plays an important role: it is the only sizable settlement in the state. Travelers and traders congregate in this tiny slice of civilization.

Montana's once-thriving mining industry has left behind a network of tunnels and shafts, some of which have been repurposed as shelters or hideouts. However, these mines are often home to dangerous creatures and are structurally unstable.

The state's vast forests are quite healthy provide a source of timber and game for the survivors. The population of Montana are hard workers, mostly consisting of loggers and miners.

The Rocky Mountains, which stretch across the western part of the state, are a treacherous landscape. They are a true wilderness and settlements within them are very rare.

6.name: Idaho
6.content:
Idaho, once known for its vast wilderness and agricultural abundance, has been transformed into a desolate wasteland after the Great War.

Despite the harsh conditions, human life persists. Scattered settlements of survivors dot the landscape, eking out a living through scavenging and trading.

The Brotherhood of Steel, drawn by the technological treasures of the Idaho National Laboratory, maintains a strong presence. Raiders and other lawless groups also roam the state, preying on the weak and vulnerable.

In the heart of the wasteland, rumors persist of a thriving settlement known as "New Boise," a beacon of hope in the desolate landscape. However, its exact location remains a mystery, hidden away by its inhabitants to protect it from the chaos of the outside world.

7.name: Arizona
7.content:
Arizona is fragmented, with each town fending for itself, often resorting to raiding neighboring settlements for resources. Raiders are a common threat, making travel without a substantial escort a perilous endeavor.

If you travel within Arizona, expect to encounter ambushes. Settlements are scarse and typically have no more than 100 residents. (NOTE TO ASSISTANT: the player should be ambushed regularlly within Arizona)

The Legion, a militaristic faction originating from New Mexico, has established a presence in the eastern part of Arizona, where they have managed to establish a semblance of order. Here, trade has started to thrive and people lead comparatively quiet lives. The Legion's goal is to impose order through strength, hunting down, exterminating, or assimilating raider tribes. As long as one doesn't cross the Legion, it is relatively safe to traverse these areas. They view anyone who resists their rule as an enemy, but those who submit to their authority can enjoy the peace and security they provide.

While the southern part of the state is largely avoided by raiders due to the harsh heat and unforgiving landscape, several tribes living a traditional life often resort to stealing from settlements for survival.

Phoenix is a sprawling suburban wasteland, a patchwork of communities. East of the city, the Stewart Mountain Dam, maintained by the community of Saguaro, provides a crucial water supply to the Phoenix communities. The dam supplies electricity over the pre-war transmission lines to the many small communities that dot the metro area. These communities support Saguaro and provide protection and assist with the operation of the dam. Without the dam, the residents of Phoenix would not survive.

Flagstaff is a fortress of solitude in northern Arizona. Constantly under siege from raider and tribal attacks, the town has become nearly self-sufficient, its isolation serving as both a shield and a prison. Traveling near Flagstaff guarantees conflict.

8.name: Utah
8.content:
Utah is a rugged and harsh landscape. The northern region is dominated by the Mormons, who have painstakingly rebuilt Salt Lake City from its war-ravaged state. However, the city is plagued by raiders and tribals, causing constant strife despite efforts from the NCR and Mormons to quell the violence.

New Canaan, nestled in the ruins of Ogden, is a bustling town primarily inhabited by Mormons, known as New Canaanites. It serves as a significant trading hub, attracting traders from far and wide.

The state is also home to numerous tribes living a primitive lifestyle, reminiscent of ancient Native Americans. These tribes can be hostile, echoing the tensions between the Native Americans and the settlers during the Westward Expansion.

The Legion's attempts to infiltrate the state have been thwarted at I-70. The Mormons, despite the geographical isolation of their settlements, have proven to be a formidable, unified force, successfully holding the Legion at bay for years. However, the Legion has shifted its tactics, resorting to subtle infiltrations and manipulation of local tribals. Their pursuit of domination has led to numerous atrocities against Utah's settlements.

Travel through southern Utah is fraught with danger due to the Legion's ongoing war and propensity for violence.

9.name: Vehicles
9.content:
Vehicles are a rare and valuable commodity. These machines are remnants of a bygone era, salvaged and repaired by the skilled hands of the Claremont Vehicle Corporation in Fontana, California.

The vehicles are a mix of retro-futuristic designs, reflecting the aesthetic of the pre-war world. They are bulky, with rounded edges and large, protruding headlights. Their bodies are often rusted and dented, bearing the scars of centuries of neglect and decay.

Despite their dilapidated exterior, these vehicles are powered by advanced technology. They operate on electricity, powered by microfusion cells. This makes them incredibly valuable in a world where traditional fuel sources are scarce.

The interiors of these vehicles are often stripped down to the bare essentials. Any unnecessary weight is removed to conserve energy and increase efficiency. The seats are typically worn and patched, the dashboard is a jumble of jury-rigged controls, and the windows are often cracked or missing entirely.
