Kafka Hibino (æ—¥ã²æ¯”ã³é‡ã® ã‚«ãƒ•ã‚«, Hibino Kafuka),[1] also known as Kaiju No. 8 (æ€ªã‹ã„ç£ã˜ã‚…ã†8å·ã”ã†, KaijÅ« Hachi-gÅ),[4] is the main protagonist of the Kaiju No. 8 manga series.

He is a Defense Force officer [6] and a former worker for the Professional Kaiju Cleaning Company Monster Sweeper Inc. [1] who was turned into humanoid Identified Kaiju with shapeshifting abilities after a small kaiju entered his body.[1] He was formerly a member of the Third Division,[7] which is being led by his childhood friend, Mina Ashiro, but he was recently transferred to the First Division.[8]



ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance


00:05

41:20

Kafka is a tall man with dark brown spiky hair, large eyes with small irises, thin eyebrows, and a mild goatee on his chin, he sports a rather muscular frame except for his slightly pudgy belly and he usually has a jovial expression on his face.[1]

Working for Monster Sweeper Inc., Kafka once regularly wore the company's uniform; it is a grey coverall with a red Monster Sweeper logo on the right side of the chest.[1]

Kafka's Kaiju Form is mostly covered with coal-black scales and plates, cyan energy sometimes glowing from between the cracks (most notably when he is charging a powerful attack). However, his head, spine, and clavicles appear to be made from exposed bone, resulting in these features being a contrasting white. Large plates with dorsal spines cover the back of his head and neck above the shoulders with the very top piece being white. As for his head, it has been described as a 'demonic skull-face' with two short, thick horns, a hole for a nose, and sharp, exposed teeth that extend down his neck. His eyes have black sclera with a cyan iris. Seemingly originating from them are several cracks, the left eye having several chunks of the 'mask' missing on the lower left part. [1] His Kaiju form resembles the armor and mask of the fallen warriors in Meireki-Era.

When out of control, some of the Kaiju Form's features become more pronounced. Such as; his general size relative to people, elongated horns, more predominate dorsal plates, mouth extending further down his neck, and eyes turning entirely cyan (without pupils or a definable beginning or end to his sclera).[9] The Kaiju Form's features became even more pronounced in the anime: four extensions on the back position in a cross shape, a greater height that forces a crouched posture, and the cyan energy turning red.[10] After Kafka learned to control the berserk state for one minute, pupils will briefly appear when he speaks in that form.

After having his heart converted into a Core to deepen his connection with the Mysterious Larva[11], Kafka's Kaiju Form undergoes a metamorphosis by shedding the black scales and plates.[12] His body is now white while still retaining the energy cracks on his upper body, the horns on his skull-face have slightly grown, curved inward and possess a set of two small eyes along each horn's curve, and his back now sports four maple leaf-shaped dorsal plates.[

Personality

Kafka has a comically childish personality in most situations, resulting in him being an easy target for teasing by other characters [1] despite being a determined and dedicated individual in serious situations, bringing him to try his best to do everything to succeed whether individually [1] or for the betterment of the group.[13] Kafka is also a genuinely caring and kind guy long before he joins the Defense Force, resulting in him going out of his way to help and care for others, regardless if they want it or not.[1] Some examples of this behavior are when Kafka offers solutions to inconveniences [14], saves people from imminent danger,[15] and sometimes scolds them for not taking better care of themselves.

It's for these reasons that Kafka does everything he can to not disappoint or sadden those who have put their trust and belief in him.[16] Having to break that connection in times of need causes him to become insecure and unsure of what he will be able to achieve in the future.

Thus, when Kafka experiences losing control of his transformed body [9], the horror of seeing himself become the thing he's hated since childhood concludes with him taking drastic action to end the situation.[17] Later on, the fear of losing control and hurting those he cares about prevents him from being able to use his Kaiju form until Kikoru Shinomiya encourages him to trust and have faith in his comrades and the Defense Force.[17]

Kafka seems to get annoyed when he is labeled as an "old man" and always reminds younger people of his condition of seniority when called names.[4]
ADVERTISEMENT
Powers & Abilities

Overall Abilities: After an unknown kaiju entered his mouth, Kafka obtained the power to transform into a humanoid Daikaiju, gaining immensely powerful abilities.[1][3] He eventually learned to use this power on a more advanced level, allowing him to change specific parts of his body without a full transformation;[4] conversely, this allows him to outwardly appear completely human if he so chooses.[18] Unfortunately, his kaiju nature remains, making it nearly impossible for Kafka to presently draw out beyond 1% of released power from the Defense Force combat suit he wears.[19] Kafka's kaiju form has a fortitude level of 9.8, the highest fortitude level seen so far in the entire series, making him one of the most powerful kaiju to ever exist, if not the most powerful.[20] He can overpower other kaiju rather easily,[1][20] even those as powerful as a base Kaiju No. 9 who has a fortitude level of 8.5, without even tiring out.[21] Kafka has shown so much dexterity with his new form that he could resist an onslaught from Vice-Captain Soshiro Hoshina [22] and disarm him without injuring him.[23] He even proved to be strong enough to resist Isao Shinomiya's attacks, a man armed with a Numbers weapon[24], albeit the man was passed his prime, and easily overpower a fellow Identified Kaiju like Kaiju No. 13.[25]

Kafka's transformation gets the better of him, resulting in a raging Kaiju No. 8 out of control, albeit when it sense the presence of an Identified No. Kaiju. It was also discovered that the longer Kafka stands in his kaiju form, the more his human body turns into a kaiju, with no possibility of returning to normal (Chapter 108). Kafka retains his individuality and sense of self when this occurs, leaving him to helplessly watch his body rampage without his consent.[9] Furthermore, due to his age, Kafka's body can't take the full strength of his blows and will eventually be damaged whenever he abuses his powers.[26]

Due to the Parasitic Kaiju, he has some unique connection that allows him to "see" the phantasms of ancient warriors. Near-dead, Kafka strengthened this link further, resulting in him reliving the Parasitic Kaiju's memories and could see the reason why he lost control was the result of the ancient Kaiju Hunters' 400-year-old grudge due to the Daikaiju of the Meireki-Era.

After his Human Heart turned into a Kaiju Core, and then came to terms with his newest path, Kafka mutated into a new form unleashing waveforms belonging to neither a Human nor Kaiju. Like the Meireki Daikaiju, his fortitude level is "unmeasurable", learning what fuels Kaiju No. 8's power is the collective, neverending stream of hatred, regret, anger, and shame from the ancient warriors.
Powers

Unleashed Combat Power: Kafka is the only Defense Force troop member to ever release 0% of their combat suit's power [13], which later increases to 1%.[19] Thus, only using his suit, Kafka's physical attributes are almost dampened by his inability to draw more power. [14] However, he still manages to get strong enough to easily tear into dead kaiju bodies. [14]
Kaiju Transformation: After a kaiju invades his body, Kafka could transform into an incredibly powerful humanoid kaiju himself, [1] and not only that, he was actually made with abilities that can corrode any Kaiju within its proximity due to the Mysterious Larva's nature against them.
Immense Strength: In kaiju form, Kafka gains immense physical strength [3] to the point where he can even annihilate a Honju [20] or seriously injured an Identified Kaiju [25] with just a single punch. Kafka could use this strength to cover great distances in a few leaps. [26] Even with only part of his body transformed, Kafka could easily lift the company's car, making Kikoru Shinomiya believe that he had his own Defense Force suit. [4] His strength in his Kaiju form is said to be on par to Isao Shinomiya, but eventually overpowered him easily when the Mysterious Larva took control. [9] Following his metamorphosis after converting his heart into a new Core, Kafka's strength evolved to the point he can send the The Daikaiju of the Meireki Era flying through the air with a destructive fallout,[27] he even deflected Kaiju No. 2's energy blast into the sky when the Meireki Kaiju targets Tachikawa with its blast was able to break the sky and skyscrapers, and fought toe-to-toe with the Kaiju to point overwhelming it with a barrage of punches.[28]
Immense Durability: In his kaiju form, due to his exceptionally thick skin, Kafka is extremely resilient to the point of tanking shots. [21] His pain resistance is so strong, that he barely felt any pain when Soshiro slashed him multiple times and came out unscathed. [22] [29] He could survive and defeat the combined power of Isao and Kaiju No. 2. [24] His durability is enhanced even further after his metamorphosis as he took a full-powered punch from The Daikaiju of the Meireki Era without flinching and only a little bleed from his nose. [27]
Immense Speed and Reflexes: In his kaiju form, Kafka possesses immense speed and reflexes as he can evade Soshiro's extremely fast sword attacks with relative ease. [22] Even when not fully transformed, Kafka has shown to be able to run at tremendous speeds, impressing even Soshiro Hoshina himself. [30] After gaining a new Core, his speed is now evolved, as he managed several blows while keeping up with the The Daikaiju of the Meireki Era, as Soshiro Hoshina and Gen Narumi were unable to land a single blow despite their speed and prediction, even with their Number Weapons proved useless against it, he also avoided all of Meireki's (using No. 2's) energy barrage despite their trajectory changes and only get a single hit nevertheless survived.[27][28]
Unlimited Energy Source: As mentioned by Kafka, the 400-year-old ancient warriors' negative emotions turned into a "neverending stream of pitch-black fuel" that powers his Kaiju form, which was realized after he strengthened his resonance with them.
Energy Attacks: Kafka can power up his body with electrical-like energy that flows through his body and spine. [3] Usually, the energy is used to make some of his attacks more powerful. [3]
Energy Roar: By concentrating the energy in his spine and opening his mouth wide, Kafka can release a powerful energy roar that can easily neutralize attacks from individuals as powerful as Kaiju No. 9. [21]
Energy Boost: Working in tandem with his shapeshifting powers, Kafka's Energy Manipulation can take the form of energy flowing out of his body's pores like thrusters, enhancing the strength and speed of his attacks. [20]
Shapeshifting: Kafka can manipulate parts of his body, manifesting tentacles and even smaller heads and limbs on his body, and can turn his tongue into a long-range capturing weapon. [3] He can also use this power, in conjunction with his energy and super strength, to shapeshift his elbows into thrusters, for more powerful blows or to morph his legs for better stability. [20] Having more fine control over it, heâ€™s able to block weapons by changing any area of his body into a jaw to grab hold of bladed attacks. [22]
Gigantification: When out of control, Kaiju No. 8 can grow in size.[9]
Kaiju Sense: Kafka can sense when a kaiju will appear near him or already in the vicinity his present whereabouts. [3] He is also able to determine what type the kaiju is if he has encountered it before. [3] More powerful kaiju can trigger this ability even when Kafka is not transformed. [31]
Regeneration: Kafka can regenerate from attacks and regrow back limbs, but doing so consumes his stamina. [22] When going out of control, Kafka's body can instantly regrow from his core after detaching it from his body.[9]
Regeneration Disruption: Kajiu No. 9 noted his regeneration became impaired from Kafka's heavy blows during their first battle, later revealed to be due to the Mysterious Larva's vengeful souls of the ancient warriors.
Force Shield: Similar to Kaiju No. 9 through No. 2's powers, after turning his Human heart into a core, Kafka has shown to have a similar force shield around his core, withstanding the The Daikaiju of the Meireki Era's slashing attack.[12]
Abilities

Kaiju Knowledge: Kafka's time as a member of the kaiju disposal team gives him immense knowledge of kaiju anatomy, using it to identify weaknesses and the type of kaiju he's facing. [13][14][32] Even when working with his Defense Force suit, from which Kafka can only draw 1% of its power, he can easily pierce through a kaiju's corpse and dig into it to further study it and localize the core. [14]

Reno Ichikawa (å¸‚ã„ã¡å·ã‹ã‚ ãƒ¬ãƒ, Ichikawa Reno) is the deuteragonist of the Kaiju No. 8 series.

He briefly worked at Monster Sweeper Inc. where he met and befriended Kafka Hibino.[1] After witnessing Kafka's transformation, Reno helped him enter the Defense Force and joined with him.[4][5] He was a member of the Third Division and after destruction of Tachikawa Base he was transferred to the Fourth Division.[6]

Respirator Mask: Reno wears a respirator mask in combat.[11]

Rifle: Reno uses a rifle in combat as his main weapon of choice, equipped with brust rounds and freeze rounds.[11][7]

Numbers Weapon 6 (è­˜åˆ¥æ€ªç£å…µå™¨ãƒŠãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚º6å·ã”ã†, NanbÄzu Roku-gÅ): Marked EC-0115 and provided by Izumo Tech, Reno's personal Numbers weapon is a special combat suit, recognized as the Defense Force's most powerful and dangerous weapon, made from the corpse of Kaiju No. 6. This suit allows the user to release ice.[7] The suit also increases his overall skill and physical abilities far beyond that of the standard combat suits of the Defense Force.[7]

Cannons: Reno earned sixteen smaller cannons, marked FN-0006 and provided by Izumo Tech, to go with his Numbers Weapon. The cannons allow him to better control his freezing attack and easily freeze multiple giant-size Daikaiju with no effort.[16]

Combat Suit (formerly): Before being given Numbers Weapon 6, Reno would wears the usual combat suit of the Defense Force.

Reno is a tall, slender young man with short silver hair and big violet eyes. He usually shows a neutral unfazed look on his face, but this expression usually changes to exasperation or incredulity when around Kafka.

Earlier in the series, Reno wore the usual Defense Force combat suit when on the battlefield. Reno's new combat suit is unique compared to the regular combat suit's worn by other Defense Force members, being the Numbers Weapon forged from Kaiju No. 6's corpse. It is a dark-blue armory suit with pipes and pistons on the back and shoulders, the Izumo Tech logo on the left side of the chest plate and the 006 insignia on the chest.[7

Personality

Reno is a calm and collected person. Despite initially antagonizing Kafka for giving up on his dream, he later shows a softer and more caring side towards his friend and his condition and goals. As their bond grows, Reno begins to show his protective side, not only towards Kafka but towards any of his comrades. His resolve in fighting in order to protect his peers brings him to completely ignore Iharu Furuhashi's one-sided rivalrly towards him and still put his safety first.

In battle, Reno is a determined and straightforward person, being a natural thinker on his own. Due to his immense sense of resposibility towards his colleagues and his desire in becoming stronger, an extended usage of his Numbers Weapon can bring Reno to spiral out of control and push himself past his limits in order to be strong enough to save those around him.
Powers & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Reno is a strong troop member with great potential. He is noted by Soshiro Hoshina to have the potential to become a captain,[8] proven when he was able to momentarily stall a kaiju as strong as Kaiju No. 9.[9] Jugo Ogata states that he is a prodigy.[7]

After becoming compatible with Numbers Weapons 6, the Defense Force's most powerful and dangerous weapon made from the corpse of Kaiju No. 6, Reno's combat skills and abilities have drastically improved, allowing him to move much faster and neutralizing a pack of kaiju on his own.[7] However, despite drastically agumenting his fighting prowess, it seems that the suit has a negative influence on Reno's behavior, bringing him to fight out of control in order to defeat his opponent. In fact, due to his immense sense of resposibility, Reno is able to draw a lot of power out of his suit but brings his human body past his limit, to the point of tearing his muscles and breaking his bones just to beat his enemy.[10]
Powers

High Unleashed Combat Power: When Reno first tries on his Defense Force combat suit, he is able to initially release 8% of the suit's power.[11] After shooting training, he is able to release 18%, having drastically improved as noted by Iharu.[12] Currently, while wearing Numbers Weapon 6, Reno's full released force has risen to 43% and he can further increase his suit's power to 51%.[13]
Enhanced Speed and Reflexes: Reno is incredibly fast, surprising Kafka with how fast he can move while carrying him.[14] He also has incredible reflexes, able to dodge Kaiju No. 9's extremely fast attacks.[15] His speed is greatly agumented when wearing Numbers Weapon 6.[13]
Enhanced Endurance: Reno has incredible levels of physical endurance, able to continue fighting after Kaiju No. 9 shot him multiple times.[15] When wearing Numbers Weapon 6, Reno is able to keep fighting even with fractured bones and muscle tears.[10]
Cryokinesis: By using Numbers Weapon 6, Reno is able to released high amounts of ice and freezing energy from his body, replicating Kaiju No. 6's late powers.[7] Reno can use it to stick to his surroundings by releasing ice from his feet, to stabilize his footing. The suit also includes freezing rounds.[7] Reno can also freeze his enemies with a simple touch of his hand.[13] After training his skills even further, Reno can now manage to freeze a whole horde of Daikaiju in one single attack.[16]
Abilities

Expert Marksman: Reno is a very skilled marksman.[12][9]
Advanced Growth Rate: After only one month of training, Reno is able to use Numbers Weapon 6 in combat with great proficiency. According to Toko, Reno's ability to improve far surpasses that of Kikoru Shinomiya's even though his current released force is lower than hers

Mina Ashiro (äºœã‚ç™½ã—ã‚ ãƒŸãƒŠ, Ashiro Mina) is the captain of the Third Division of the Defense Force and the childhood friend of Kafka Hibino.[1]



ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance


00:06

41:20

Mina is a beautiful young woman with waist-length black hair that is styled into a ponytail and decorated with a barrette, big dark-orange eyes with a mole under each eye and an athletic physique.[1] Under her uniform, she has a small scar on the left side of her upper chest.[3]

When she was 18, her hair were shorter and styled into a bob cut.[5]

She usually wears the Defense Force combat suit, along with a white visor that enables her to increase her vision. In battle, she usually wields firearms and her personal cannon.[6]
Gallery

Mina as a child
Mina as a child
Mina at age 18
Mina at age 18
Younger Mina
Younger Mina
ADVERTISEMENT

Personality

Mina is a serious and determined woman who takes her work and role in the Defense Force very seriously and she strives to uphold the promise made as a child to defeat every kaiju to the point that she dedicates all of herself to kaiju fighting. Despite her professional behavior, she has a soft spot for Kafka Hibino: although she was upset with him for not keeping his promise to stand at her side, she remembers their friendship fondly and wishes to see him succeed in the Defense Force, even after learning he was Kaiju No. 8.

Under her tough exterior, Mina shows her authentic self as a caring person who does her best to make sure nobody gets injured in a fight and keep everyone safe. She is also prone to showing gratitude to her subordinates, praising people for their help whenever possible and being able to acknowledge someone's worth. However, these traits also contribute to a deep seated fear of failure within her. In her mind, any mistake would invalidate the sacrifices of her comrades and violate the trust civilians have in her. Although unhealthy, this mindset is also what drives her to perform as well as she does in battle.[5]
ADVERTISEMENT

Power & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Mina is the Defense Force Third Division captain who is known as "the strongest" female captain of the Defense Force [7] where she has neutralized hundreds of kaiju in her career.[1] She has displayed the power to easily overpower giant-sized kaiju with a few shots.[8] According to director general Keiji Itami, against giant kaiju Mina is stronger than Gen Narumi, furtherly stating that she's the only person in the world able to work with larger weapons in such a proficient way.[9] Itami even went on to theorize that, against Kaiju No. 6 ten years ago, the damage that occurred could've been mitigated to under a third if Mina was active back then.[9]

Mina's incredible might was acknowledged from the very first mission she had with the Third Division. director general Isao Shinomiya, upon finding out about her power, even declared that she was "the missing link" and that she'd change kaiju neutralization forever.[5] Even an enemy like Kaiju No. 9 acknowledges and admires Mina's strength, wishing to take it from her to grow stronger.[10]
Powers

High Unleashed Combat Power: As a Defense Force captain, Mina is capable of using a high amount of her combat suit's power. Her maximum unleashed combat power is 96%.[8]
Enhanced Strength: Mina possesses incredible physical strength as shown when she easily carries around her large cannon in combat with dexterity.[11]
Enhanced Speed and Reflexes: Mina is incredibly swift and agile, capable of moving around the battlefield gracefully while dodging multiple attacks from an empowered Kaiju No. 9.[12][13]
Abilities

Master Marksman: Mina is a marksman of the highest caliber that she is known as "The Defense Force's Strongest Supergiant-Class Killer" because of her extraordinary marksmanship skills and mastery of her personal cannon. Her shots also possess tremendous power behind them as shown when she easily defeated a large kaiju.[8] Mina can also have her tiger Bakko stabilize her, increasing her accuracy to precisely hit specific parts of a kaiju's body.[11] Mina's skill as a marksman is great enough to surpass even that of Gen Narumi, who is hailed as "Japan's Strongest Anti-Kaiju Combatant."[14]
Leadership Skills: As the captain of the Third Division, Mina has shown excellent leadership skills.[1]
ADVERTISEMENT

Battles

Mina, Soshiro Hoshina and Kikoru Shinomiya vs Kaiju No. 10 (Win): Chapter 30 - Chapter 31
Mina vs Six Supergiant-class Kaiju (Win): Chapter 75 - Chapter 76
Mina vs Kaiju No. 14 (Win): Chapter 76 - Chapter 96
Mina & Kafka vs Kaiju No. 9 (ongoing) :
Equipment

Combat Suit: Mina wears a normal Defense Force combat suit on the battlefield. [1]

Respirator Mask: Like many other officers, Mina carries a respirator mask in battle with her.[1]

Rifle: When not using her cannon, Mina wields a rifle in the battlefield.[1]

Handgun: Mina also carries a handgun on her side.[15]

Visor: When using her cannon, Mina wears a visor that amplifies her vision and helps her analyze her targets from a distance.[8]

Cannon: Marked T-25101985 and provided by Izumo Tech, Mina's cannon in conjunction with her high force released with firearms is a powerful weapon, able to seriously damage or kill massive daikaiju-level targets with only a few rounds.[8] Unfortunately, she can only carry a finite number of rounds on her person and can load up to 5 rounds at a time.[16]

Anti-Giant-Class Kaiju Rail Gun (å¯¾å¤§å‹æ€ªã‹ã„ç£ã˜ã‚…ã†å›ºãƒ¬å®šãƒ¼é›»ãƒ«ç£ã‚¬ç ²ãƒ³, Tai ÅŒgata-KaijÅ« RÄ“ru Gan): Mina's new weapon specially made to suit her skills. A giant cannon that allows her to instant kill Daikaiju level monsters even from a 20 kilometers distance.[4]

Etymology

Mina's surname Ashiro contains the kanji for "second, Asia" (äºœ, a) and "white" (ç™½, shiro).
Trivia

Mina likes sweet food, baths and has liked dried cuttlefish ever since she was young.[2][17]
Mina likes cats and any kind of feline.[2]
When Mina was in elementary school, she was the caretaker of animals.[17]
Mina owns a grey tiger named Bakko, which she brings with her to fight kaiju.[1]
According to Naoya Matsumoto, the combat suit used by the Defense Force was originally designed to suit Mina.[2]
Mina ranked #7 in the first character popularity polls and #6 in the second

Soshiro Hoshina (ä¿ã»ç§‘ã—ãª å®—ãã†å››ã—éƒã‚ã†, Hoshina SÅshirÅ)[6] is the vice-captain of the Third Division of the Defense Force,[4] and a member of the Hoshina Family, a renowned clan of swordsmen from the Muromachi period.[7] He is also Soichiro Hoshina's younger brother.[3]

Soshiro is one of the main protagonists of Kaiju No. 8: B-Side, a spin-off series of Kaiju No. 8.[8][9][10][11]



ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance


00:01

41:20

Soshiro is an athletic young man of average height with a small yet muscular build and dark violet short hair in a bob cut style. His red eyes (purple in the anime) are closed most of the time and he always has a jovial expression on his face,[6] except when serious scenarios made him display an imposing expression with his eyes opened.[12]

When on-duty, Soshiro wears the usual Defense Force uniform.[4] He also wears the normal combat suit used by Defense Force members when on the battlefield.[12] While wearing Numbers Weapon 10, Soshiro wears a combat suit with light-purple scale-like armor with green outlines, a long mechanical tail and Kaiju No. 10's signature eye in the middle of the chest plate.[13]

As a child, Soshiro was mostly identical to his current appearance, most wearing a traditional training outfit.[2]
Gallery

Soshiro as a child
Soshiro as a child
Soshiro's training attire
Soshiro's training attire
Soshiro's Defense Force uniform
Soshiro's Defense Force uniform
ADVERTISEMENT

Personality

Soshiro is rather laid-back, always having a smile on his face; it is very rare to see him downtrodden. He seems to enjoy making fun of others, especially Kafka Hibino considering him a comic relief.[6] However, he does have some serious moments when he speaks firmly and open his eyes to emphasize the seriousness of his words.[14] Soshiro also likes to tease captain Gen Narumi from the First Division. Despite Soshiro's relaxed and friendly appearance, he is very intelligent and intuitive. He was the only one who correctly suspected Kafka's identity as Kaiju No. 8, thus one of the main reasons he accepted him in the Third Division despite failing the exam was to keep an eye on him.[14]

Soshiro has a great, yet hidden, sense of loyalty towards the Defense Force and feels very thankful towards his captain Mina Ashiro for letting him into her division. His sense of loyalty to his role in the force is so strong that he deep down sees it as his only reason to live.[2] Soshiro is also very thankful as seen when he talked to Kafka two months after he proved to be Kaiju No. 8 and thanked him for saving his life and those of his subordinates showing to hold no grudge towards him.[15]

Soshiro is also very linked to his family and its swordsmanship tradition. His father's skepticism of his abilities[2] and his feeling of inferiority towards his older brother Soichiro Hoshina [3] brought Soshiro to hone his swordplay and identify his whole being within the art of the blade.[3] He was also seen training alone despite being very late at night, replaying in his mind the fight he had against Kaiju No. 8. This further proves that Soshiro is also very hard-working and determined to be strong enough to defeat all the Kaiju. However, During his fight with Kaiju No. 12, No. 10 digged into Soshiro's psyche and made him realize that he always had fun swinging the sword , with Soshiro finally accepting his simplemindedness as his main resolve for fighting and improving himself.[16]

Soshiro is aware that times have changed and the era of swords is more than over and most members of the Defense Force look down on him because of his fighting style. Despite this he feels it is his duty to wield his sword because he's spent better part of his life in training and improving his swordmanship and it's the only way he knows to fight against Kaiju. In battle, Soshiro is perceptive enough to notice his opponent's mental state as well as the mood of the skirmish itself, alerting him whenever a fight is favorably going his way or otherwise and thus adapting on the spot.
ADVERTISEMENT

Power & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Soshiro is the vice-captain of the Third Division of the Defense Force and a powerful combatant, capable of fighting on par with Kaiju No. 10.[17][18][19] While his skill set puts him at a disadvantage against large-sized Kaiju, Soshiro's proficiency in defeating small to mid-sized Kaiju in battle surpasses that of the captain of the First Division, "Japan's Strongest Anti-Kaiju Combatant", Gen Narumi.[20]

Ever since wearing Numbers Weapon 10, Soshiro's physical attributes have been dampened due to the weapon being the first Kaiju weapon in the history of the Defense Force to have a mind of itâ€™s own.[21] However, when reaching a temporary status of synchronization, Soshiro is able to easily overpower minor Kaiju, with the potential to use his Numbers Weapon to the fullest.[22]

Against Kaiju No. 12, the improved and final version of Kaiju No. 10, Soshiro is initially overwhelmed by the monster due to it possessing far superior speed, strength and fighting ability compared to No. 10.[23] But after revealing his secret weapon, Soshiro is able to gain the upper hand on No. 12 for a short period of time before the monster adapts to his fighting style.[3][5] Eventually, after a very tough battle, Soshiro is able to defeat No. 12 with a new technique that he develops during their battle.[24][25]
Powers

High Unleashed Combat Power: As a Defense Force vice-captain, Soshiro is capable of using a high amount of his combat suit's power. His maximum unleashed combat power in a normal Defense Force combat suit is 92%,[26] but abusing the suit's power will cause him to overheat.[27] While wearing Numbers Weapon 10, he is capable of using 100% of his suit's power.[16]
Enhanced Strength: Soshiro has incredible physical strength, able to slice through Kaiju No. 8's incredibly tough skin with ease.[28] He is also capable of slicing through Kaiju No. 10's tough skin despite being heavily damaged, something not even Kikoru Shinomiya could do with her own personal weapon.[29] During his training session with Kafka and without wearing a combat suit, Soshiro is able to overwhelm the latter with only a few punches [30] and sends him back a great distance with one punch while he is holding a reinforced training bag.[31]
Immense Speed and Reflexes: Soshiro is an extremely fast combatant with extraordinary reflexes. He is shown killing a Kaiju without any noticeable movement.[7] Kafka (in his Kaiju form) is shocked by how fast he moves and states that his speed is on a whole other level when compared to Kikoru.[28] His speed is so great that he even impressed Kaiju No. 10 with how fast he can move.[32] He is also capable of dodging extremely fast attacks from Kaiju No. 10,[17][18][19] as well as Kaiju No. 12,[3] at point blank range.
Enhanced Durability: Soshiro is an incredibly durable combatant as shown when he emerges completely unscathed after Kaiju No. 10 sends him flying through a building.[18]
Enhanced Endurance: Soshiro possesses tremendous levels of physical endurance. Despite being heavily injured after taking a powerful punch from Kaiju No. 10, he is able to continue fighting even after his suit overheats.[27] After going well beyond his suit's limit, he is still able to push beyond and use 63% of his suit's power despite being heavily fatigued.[2]
Abilities

Master Swordsman: Soshiro is an extremely skilled swordsman who hails from the Hoshina Family, a family of Kaiju slayers dating back to the Muromachi period, and is one of the Defense Forceâ€™s strongest blade specialists. When using his custom-made twin swords or his katana, Soshiro can quickly cut down his opponents with extreme speed and precision.[7][3] According to his father, even at a very young age, Soshiro wouldâ€™ve been considered a prodigy in the Edo period due to his extraordinary mastery in swordsmanship.[2] Soshiro further showcased his mastery in swordsmanship by coming up with a new form in the middle of the fight against Kaiju No. 12.[24] His older brother and captain of the Sixth Division, Soichiro Hoshina, states that when it comes to the blade, Soshiro stands above everyone in the Hoshina Family past or present.[25]
Martial Arts Mastery: Despite specializing in swordsmanship, Soshiro is a highly skilled unarmed fighter. He is capable of using Isao Shinomiya's fighting style with great proficiency and easily overpower Kafka Hibino in their training session.[30] His close-quarters fighting ability is stated to be the strongest within the entire Defense Force.[5] He was even capable of evolving Isao's fighting techniques.[33]
Leadership Skills: As a vice-captain, Soshiro has shown excellent leadership skills, able to guide a whole platoon and multiple officers on the battlefield during major battles.[34]
Keen Intellect: Soshiro is a very intelligent man. He is shown explaining, in detail, the catastrophes that Kaiju No. 9 caused as well as itâ€™s abilities to the eastern division of the Defense Force [20] and is able to deduce the location of No. 9's whereabouts.[35] He also likes to plan for the future as shown when he asked Konomi Okonogi to develop a new secret weapon just in case Kaiju No. 9 observed his battle with Kaiju No. 10.[3]
Fighting Style

Soshiro's unleashed combat power when it comes to using firearms is low, so he prefers close-ranged sword fighting. Unlike other Defense Force officers, Soshiro uses his family's unique fighting style, known as Hoshina Style (ä¿ã»ç§‘ã—ãªæµ, Hoshina-ryÅ«)[18] His extraordinary mastery in swordsmanship allows him to brutally kill a Kaiju before Kafka's eyes without the latter noticing any movement from him.[7] After many battles, Soshiro even managed to created a completely new form mid-fight against Kaiju No. 12, showing how much his skills with the dual style sword-slay technique has improved over the years.[24]

Soshiro's field of expertise with his style is the sword-slay technique, used with a Dual-Blade Form (äºŒåˆ€å‹, NitÅ-gata). His skills and power easily allow him to fight toe-to-toe with Kaiju of Identified class, like No. 8,[28] No. 10[18] and No. 12.[5] He also proved to use the quick-slash technique and the single-blade form with remarkable ability, despite the latter being Soichiro's specialty.

ADVERTISEMENT

Battles

Soshiro vs Kaiju No. 8 (Interrupted): Chapter 19 - Chapter 20
Soshiro vs Kaiju No. 10 (Interrupted): Chapter 25 - Chapter 30
Soshiro, Kikoru Shinomiya and  Mina Ashiro vs Kaiju No. 10 (Win): Chapter 30 - Chapter 31
Soshiro and Numbers Weapon 10 vs Chofu Airport Kaiju (Win): Chapter 73 - Chapter 75
Soshiro and Numbers Weapon 10 vs Kaiju No. 12 (Win): Chapter 76 - Chapter 93
Equipment

Combat Suit (formerly): On the battlefield, Soshiro wears a normal Defense Force combat suit.[12]
Rifle: Despite having a low released force in shooting, Soshiro is shown wielding a rifle on the battlefield.[12]
Respirator Mask: Soshiro wears a respirator mask in battle.[12]
Numbers Weapon 10 (è­˜åˆ¥æ€ªç£å…µå™¨ãƒŠãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚º10å·ã”ã†, NanbÄzu JÅ«-gÅ): Soshiro's personal Numbers weapon, provided by Izumo Tech, is a special combat suit crafted from the body of Kaiju No. 10. This suit has light-purple scale-like armor with green outlines, a long mechanical tail, and No. 10's signature eye in the middle of the chest plate. It is the first Numbers weapon in the history of the Defense Force that has a will of it's own.
Twin Swords: Marked SW-2033 and provided by Izumo Tech, Soshiro's personal weapons are a pair of twin swords.[7] The blades are sharp and durable enough to slice through incredibly tough Kaiju like Kaiju No. 8[28] and Kaiju No. 10.[19] He is shown to have multiple swords as a back up.[3]
Katana: Marked SW-1023, Soshiro uses a single katana as a secret weapon, despite this being a weapon usually wielded by his older brother. The blade is sharp enough to easily slice through Kaiju No. 12.[3] He is shown to have multiple katanas as a back up.[3][5]

Kikoru Shinomiya (å››ã—ãƒã®å®®ã¿ã‚„ ã‚­ã‚³ãƒ«, Shinomiya Kikoru)[2] is one of the main protagonists of the Kaiju No. 8 series. She is the young daughter of Defense Force Director General Isao Shinomiya and a member of the Third Division.[5] After Tachikawa Base was destroyed,[6] Kikoru was transferred to the First Division and was trained by Gen Narumi.[7]

Kikoru is one of the main protagonists of Kaiju No. 8: B-Side, a spin-off series of Kaiju No. 8.[8][9][10][11]



ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance


1/2
Skip in 3s


Kikoru is a petite and fairly short young girl with long blonde hair that is tide in twintails on the sides, decorated with two black bows, big green eyes and she possesses a rather skinny yet athletic physique.[2] Considering her overall appearance and her hair, she resembles her mother Hikari Shinomiya very much.[12]

On duty, Kikoru wears the usual combat suit of the Defense Force along with her usual arsenal.[13] With Numbers Weapon 4 as her new personal weapon, Kikoru dons a light-colored scaly suit with a long skirt. It has both of Izumo Tech's logos (the one for weapons at the end of the skirt and the regular one at the top) and the 004 insignia on the chest.[14]

Her casual attire consists of a long grey dress.[2]

When Kikoru was a child, she had slightly shorter hair with the same hair as today.

Personality

Kikoru appears as an arrogant and prideful girl [2] who is very confident in her ability to look down on people and humiliate those she deems inferior without a second thought.[5][16] Kikoru is also a very persistent and determined person, working hard to constantly improve herself and becoming stronger and more useful whenever she can. Even towards superior officers, she still manages to show her confidence, although in a much more polite and less arrogant way.

Despite this more evident trait, Kikoru deep down cares about her comrades and does whatever in her power to avoid casualties or injuries whenever she's on the battlefield. She is also a loyal person, showing gratitude towards Kafka Hibino for saving her, and keeping his secret. Even if it's hidden by her proud and unafraid nature, she cares for her allies well-being and goes as far as needed to ensure their safety or simply to support them.

It is revealed that Kikoru used to be very fond of her parents' work as Defense Force members, and this brought her to desire to join the Force herself. However, every since Hikari Shinomiya's death, Kikoru grew a hidden yet large sense of insecurity that brought her to push herself to get stronger and stronger, in order to keep the promise made to her mother. This, in tandem with Isao Shinomiya's overly high expectations on Kikoru, cause her to constantly feel the need to get stronger to avoid the death of anyone around her. Her relationship with her father and everything regarding her family as a whole seem to make her insecure and hesitant, easily breaking down in despair. This feelings obviously increased ever since Isao's death with her wish to get stronger growing again due to living the same trauma twice. Hidden in Kikoru's subconscious, in fact, lies her obsessive desire of being praised by her parents and grant their approval, fueling her will to become stronger in order to prove to be worthy of their praise.

Kikoru appears to be very polite and professional when speaking to higher ups and superiors, being probably used to speaking to military officers due to her upbringing.
ADVERTISEMENT

Powers & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Kikoru is the daughter of two famous high-ranking former Defense Force soldiers with a prodigious talent. Despite being a first-year rookie, many of her peers and superiors acknowledged her combat prowess is second to no one, allowing her to single-handedly neutralize a horde of Yoju and their Honju all by herself, and with minimal effort.[16] Her excellent skills in combat, in tandem with her remarkable Unleashed Combat Power and tactical skills, earned Kikoru the praise of many senior officers, most of them agreeing that she will become a linchpin of the Defense Force in the future. Ever since being enlisted, her abilities earned her the privilege of wielding a personal weapon in battle, which is usually only granted to higher ranking Division members.[17] Keiji Itami states that watching her on the battlefield reminds him of her mother, former Second Division Captain Hikari Shinomiya.[12]

Kikoru shows a rare compatibility with number weapons, achieving class 5 compatibility with Numbers Weapon 4, and class 4 with Numbers Weapon 1, 2, and 7.[18]

After being granted Numbers Weapon 4 by Captain Gen Narumi,[19] Kikoru's already exceptional physical attributes evolved even further, allowing her to easily spar with Gen himself, with him also wearing a Numbers Weapon,[20] and eliminate kaiju with a Fortitude level of 7.0.[3] The suit also allows her to temporarily fight on par with a Identified Kaiju of Kaiju No. 15's caliber.[21] Kikoru can see her mother's Ghost through Kaiju No. 4's memories while wearing Numbers Weapon 4, allowing her to mimic her mother's movement and improve her combat techniques.[22] By following her mother's Ghost in battle and copying its moves, Kikoru's combat prowess reaches numbers and performances worth of a Captain-level officer.[23]
Powers

Flight: While using Numbers Weapon 4, Kikoru is able to fly long distances at extreme speeds.[3]
High Unleashed Combat Power: Despite being a rookie, Kikoru is initially able to release 46% of her combat suit's power on her first try while wearing a normal Defense Force combat suit, which Soshiro Hoshina states is platoon leader-class.[13] She further improves her strength after marksman training, capable of releasing 55%.[24] After training with Gen Narumi, Kikoru was initially able to release 84% of the suit's power while wearing Numbers Weapon 4,[25] with the number growing to 88% in a stable form,[22] and 94% at its highest.[23]
Enhanced Strength: Kikoru's strength, when wearing her Defense Force combat suit, is enough for her to effortlessly lift a car with one arm.[2] Her physical strength is furtherly augmented when wearing Numbers Weapon 4, enabling her to crush kaiju with one attack or fight on par with stronger opponents.[22]
Enhanced Speed: When wearing her uniform, Kikoru can run way faster than most of her peers, with them struggling to follow her pace.[16] Wearing Numbers Weapon 4, famous for being the Defense Force's fastest Numbers Weapon, Kikoru is able to move and fight faster than trained soldiers can follow and even evade powerful blitz attacks.[21]
Enhanced Endurance: Kikoru's suit is resistant enough to prevent a shot from Kaiju No. 9 from killing her, although the shot can still tear the suit through.[15] Despite being severely injured from No. 9's powerful attacks, she is able to stand and continue fighting.[12][26] With Numbers Weapon 4, Kikoru's endurance has drastically improved since she's able to tank blows from a kaiju like No. 15, although not coming out unscathed.[21]
Abilities

Axemanship Mastery: Kikoru is highly skilled at killing kaiju, so much so that she is granted her own personal weapon, a giant axe.[17] Initially trained by Soshiro Hoshina[11], Kikoru's axemanship has evolved significantly within the First Division.[27][12] After training with Gen Narumi, Kikoru's level of skill and performance in battle now resembles that of a Division Captain.

Equipment

Combat Suit (formerly): Kikoru wears the usual combat suit on the battlefield.[13]

Respirator Mask: Kikoru wears a respirator mask in combat.[16]

Numbers Weapon 4 (è­˜åˆ¥æ€ªç£å…µå™¨ãƒŠãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚º4å·ã”ã†, NanbÄzu Yon-gÅ): Just like her mother Hikari Shinomiya, Kikoru is compatible with Numbers Weapon 4, a special combat suit made from the corpse of Kaiju No. 4.[14] It is the Defense Force's fastest Numbers weapon, giving her immense speed on the battlefield and the only one capable of flight.

Numbers Weapon 1 (1, NanbÄzu Ichi-gÅ): In the fight with Kaiju No. 9, Gen Narumi gives weapon number 1 to Kikoru Shinomiya, allowing her to predict his attacks and assist Kafka.[30]

Battle Axes

First Battle Axe (formerly; destroyed): A "Failed Prototype", marked AX-0112 which had been made from the uni-organ of a Honju who generated strong bioelectric potential contracting its muscle fiber, then fires the air it took in as a shockwave, after being subjugated two years prior in Shinagawa. Designed to be tough and heavy to compensate, it became heavy for those without a high released power, equipped with a trigger that, when pulled, releases a shockwave through an electric current. If released from behind it accelerates the force of the swing,while releasing it forward adds greater force.[17] The axe was destroyed during her third encounter with Kaiju No. 9.[26]
Second Battle Axe: A second battle axe, marked AX-0113, was later given for Kikoru.[3]
Giant Sword (tentative; destroyed) After proving herself to Mina Ashiro and Soshiro Hoshina, 03 5-12066 was intended to be her Custom Weapon and Prototype crafted from the shell of a Reptilian Kaiju which emerged in Hamamatsu a year prior, with Izumo Tech producing a tough yet lightweight final product. Equipped with three thrusters on the blunt side of the blade that produces a strong and fast swing which could cut through three Crustacean-type Yoju. Although, it was an "outrageous weapon" in combat, it proved almost incapable of cutting through hardened shells without much effort, lacking decisive killing power for Kikoru's ideal weapon.

Handgun: Kikoru carries a handgun for long-ranged attacks, equipped with a torch and a laser sight.[27]

Rifle (formerly; destroyed): Before being given her signature axe, Kikoru would use a rifle.[13]

Narumi (é³´ãªã‚‹æµ·ã¿ å¼¦ã’ã‚“, Narumi Gen) is the seventh captain[7] of the First Division of the Defense Force, and he is known as "Japan's Strongest Anti-Kaiju Combatant".[4] He is also the mentor of Kikoru Shinomiya.[8]

Gen is one of the main protagonists of Kaiju No. 8: B-Side, a spin-off series of Kaiju No. 8.[9][5][10][11]



ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance


1/2
Loading Pods
Visit Advertiser website
GO TO PAGE

Gen is a tall, athletic young man with a lean yet muscular build.[12] His hair is naturally all black,[10] but he dyed the front section of his hair grey to give it a two-toned color. This allows him to switch his hairstyle between a black bob with hints of grey (generally when he is off-duty) and slicked back, revealing the majority of his grey hair (mostly during combat). He also has sharp, red eyes (magenta in the anime and when using RT-0001) and his eyebrows are very short and thick.[13][6]

As a teenage officer in the First Division, Gen was shorter and lankier than he is now, but sported the same signature hairstyle he currently wears.[14]

As a Defense Force captain, Gen wears the normal Defense Force combat suit with a respirator mask and his personal weapon. He also wears a black trenchcoat before his missions.[2] When wearing Numbers Weapon 1, Gen dons a dark grey armored-like combat suit with Izumo Tech's logo on the shoulder pads and the 001 insignia on the chest. The suit also includes a black and grey jacket

Personality

Despite showing an apparent serious demeanor, Gen hides a lazy and childish personality, overreacting when slightly annoyed by something. His unprofessional demeanor brings him to give priorities to futile things over work like his videogames and action figures,[6] or his followers on social media.[4]

Nevertheless, once he arrives on the battlefield, Gen's attitude changes radically, becoming very serious and dedicated to his work as captain of his own division, giving specific orders to his subordinates.[2]

When confronting other people, Gen seems to be very informal and rude as he casually speaks up to director general Isao Shinomiya[5] and gets mad at Eiji Hasegawa whenever the latter scolds him.[6] He seems to value skills above all else, and demands results by anyone serving in his division.[2] Despite his childish and superficial behavior, Gen is still held in high regard by many people close to him with Director General Isao himself entrusting Gen with the safety of the Defense Force and the entire country.[16]

Like most members of the First Division, Gen has a strong rivalry towards the Third Division, specifically with vice-captain Soshiro Hoshina, who often teases him in front of his subordinates, leading to verbal arguments.[17]
ADVERTISEMENT
Powers & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Gen is the captain of the First Division of the Defense Force, the strongest division, and he is known as "Japan's Strongest Anti-Kaiju Combatant".[4]

Although he holds the title as "the strongest", Gen was never once able to beat his former mentor, Isao Shinomiya.[14] The reason for this is because Isao recognized that Gen's level of skill would surpass his own, and kept up with his training non-stop to continue being a "wall" for Gen to overcome one day.[18]

During his battle against Kaiju No. 9's Beta duplicate (stated by the original No. 9 to be as strong as it was before shedding its skin), Gen easily defeated the daikaiju's clone once he got serious[19] and was able to fight on par with No. 9's main body alongside Kafka Hibino after it absorbed Kaiju No. 2's power.[16][20] While initially at a disadvantage against Kaiju No. 11 due to not being able to read the movements of its water-based attacks, after being taunted by No. 11 who possesses the memories of Isao, Gen reveals that he evolved his RT-0001 weapon which allowed him to gain the upper hand[14][7] and defeat the monster.[18]

Even before joining the Defense Force, Gen possessed the unique ability to draw out power from kaiju tissue and weaponize the severed limb of a dead kaiju effortlessly. This unique ability is something that can only be done with uniorgans that are adjusted for use in combat suits. His instincts, speed and reflexes were great enough to avoid an attack coming straight at him and sever one of the kaiju's limbs before it can react.[9]
Powers

Foresight: Gen awakened the RT-0001 weapon after equipping the outer-shell light spectacles made from Kaiju No. 1's retinas into his own eyes on a regular basis.[11] With this weapon, he has the ability to see the brain impulses throughout living beings' bodies which allows him to predict when and where an enemy is going to strike and his attacks become "inescapable",[19] however, he is not able to predict the movements of non-organic objects like water.[21] This power is further enhanced when he wears the Numbers Weapon 1 combat suit.[22] After years of training, Gen managed to evolve his RT-0001 weapon which is now capable of perceiving the movements of electrons', temperature fluctations, the terrain and every detail of a location through the eyes all around his Numbers Weapon 1 combat suit, making it possible for him to predict what happens via a clear mental vision. With his evolved weapon, he literally has the power to see the future.[7]
High Unleashed Combat Power: As a Defense Force captain, Gen is capable of using a high amount of his combat suit's power. When he first joined the Defense Force, his unleashed combat power was 24% despite the fact that he had never worn a combat suit before.[5] Years later after reaching the rank of captain, his maximum unleashed combat power in a normal Defense Force combat suit is 98%.[12]
Enhanced Strength: Gen has incredible physical strength; he can swing his large bayonet around in combat with dexterity[12] and slice through a daikaiju's tough skin with ease.[12][16][20][14]
Immense Speed and Reflexes: Gen is extremely fast; his speed is so great that his attacks become "inescapable" when he uses RT-0001,[19][16] and he is shown outrunning Kafka Hibino in his kaiju form when rushing to aid Isao Shinomiya in his fight against Kaiju No. 9.[23] He can even close the gap between him and his opponent in an instant to catch them off guard and deliver a devastating blow.[12][16][14] His reflexes are also top notch, as he is capable of dodging Kaiju No. 9's high-speed attacks, even when caught off guard.[16]
Enhanced Durability: Gen is an incredibly resilient fighter, as shown when he emerges completely unscathed from a powerful attack from Kaiju No. 9.[12] Even after No. 9 absorbed Kaiju No. 2's power, he only received minor injuries during the fight.[20] In his battle against Kaiju No. 11, Gen only received moderate injuries from its water-based attacks.[21]
Immense Endurance: Gen possesses tremendous levels of physical endurance and stamina. After fifteen minutes of a full release with Numbers Weapon 1 and even close to overheating, Gen is capable of enduring multiple water-based attacks from Kaiju No. 11 as well as a powerful blow from the monster itself that sent him flying through a building, receiving major injuries and still being able to battle.[21][8][14] Even when under the immense physical and mental stress of Numbers Weapon 1, Gen continues battling despite being severely injured.[7]
Abilities

Bayonet Mastery: Gen is extremely skilled at using his bayonet to kill kaiju, as shown when he defeats a large honju-level kaiju with a fortitude level of 7.2 by himself with great ease.[6] He uses the blade to slash and sear through a kaiju's body, making it very difficult for them to regenerate[12] and is shown to be a master marksman, capable of shooting his enemies with deadly accuracy and precision.[12][19] He also uses his bayonet as a shield to defend himself from attacks.[12][20]
Martial Arts Mastery: Gen has been an incredibly skilled athlete and martial artist since childhood.[5][10] After joining the Defense Force, he was trained by Isao Shinomiya in different forms of combat such as hand-to-hand, swordsmanship and sharpshooting. His close-quarters fighting ability is said to rival Soshiro Hoshina, "The Defense Force's Strongest Close-Quarters Combatant".[14][7]
Leadership Skills: As a captain, Gen has shown excellent leadership skills on the battlefield despite his lazy and childish personality, giving orders to his division with absolute authority.[2][24]
Keen Intellect: Gen is a very intelligent individual despite his childish and eccentric nature. He received high academic scores in school as a teenager and in the Defense Force, putting him at the top of his class.[5] When it comes to battle, even during a major crisis, he manages to think clearly to gain major insight on the battlefield and the enemies movements.

Kaiju No. 9 (æ€ªã‹ã„ç£ã˜ã‚…ã†9å·ã”ã†, KaijÅ« Kyu-gÅ)[3], currently merged with the The Daikaiju of the Meireki Era, is the main antagonist of Kaiju No. 8 and its anime adaptation.

It is a humanoid Identified Kaiju who goes around reviving the kaiju killed by the Defense Force for the sake of taking back the kaiju power stolen by humans, along with creating other Kaiju to serve as minions in an attempt to battle and destroy the Defense Force, other parts of its plans against humanity have not yet been revealed apart from this.[4][5] It previously infiltrated Professional Kaiju Cleaning Company Monster Sweeper Inc.[6]



ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance


00:00

41:20

It appears as a tall beige humanoid kaiju with a skeletal body, spikes on its shoulder, and a head with two hammerhead shark-like protuberances.[4] Its mouth has a set of jagged lipless block-like teeth[4] and little round black eyes that it hides with its shapeshifting powers.[1] Its overall shape has a long and slender silhouette with an eerie appearance.[7] In the anime, Kaiju No. 9's body also contains faded brown coloration on its shoulders, fingers, knees and feet, and darker brown shade freckles on the chest and shoulders.

After shedding its skin, Kaiju No. 9 has a more muscular appearance with a slightly darker skin tone.[5]

In its fused form with an Ant-type kaiju, No. 9 has the lower part of its body replaced by an Ant-type kaiju which it controls and uses to move around.[8] After fusing with Kaiju No. 2, No. 9 is now much larger than before, keeping its darker skin tone, with a long tail, three sets of eyes and only one protuberance on its head instead of two.[9]

In its fused form with Kaiju No. 2, No. 9 mostly keeps his appearance, although sprouting No. 2's head near its and an additional pair of arms behind its back.[10]

Additionally, Kaiju No. 9 has taken the appearance of Takamichi Hotaka,[6] Kanji Nagamine[3] and Isao Shinomiya.[9]

Personality

Kaiju No. 9 seems to be a cold and calm individual,[4] paying much attention to what happens around it.[6] It is ruthless and driven to finish its missions no matter what, and doesn't hesitate to kill enemies who engage it,[4][1] though it is also willing to spare innocent bystanders if it means to avoid drawing unwanted attention unto itself.[3] While calculating and aloof, it can still demonstrate pure anger and annoyance whenever it is defeated or if its plans are constantly thwarted.[6] Its weakness lies in the fact that it never seems to learn from its mistakes, having continually underestimated humanity in spite of the number of times that humans have exceeded the kaijus expectations of them.

Kaiju No. 9's main personality trait is its determination in destroying the Defense Force and retrieving a great "kaiju power".[5] Its resolve, along with its scheming nature, brings it to formulate articulate and complex plans to crush the Defense Force. The focus on its plan is so strong that No. 9 appears as a completely apathetic and distant creature, showing no affection or even attention to the kaiju he spawned to eliminate the Defense Force officers.[11]

In spite of its usual analytical, collected and rational demeanor, Kaiju No. 9 is not above being vengeful and holding a grudge against those who have defeated it or ruined its plans, like Kaiju No. 8.[3]

Suprisingly, despite wanting to create a world ruled by Kaiju, No. 9 has stated that deep down it has always admired humans and their tenacity. It has always wanted to understand humanity and its potential further by learning more about their society. This point is further exemplified in No. 9's conversation with Kafka after its defeat in Chap 113.
ADVERTISEMENT

Powers & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Kaiju No. 9 is one of the strongest kaiju seen so far in the series, having a fortitude level of 8.5 when it first appeared.[12] It was able to stall and almost kill two talented Defense Force members and could resist Kaiju No. 8's heavy attacks before fleeing from the scene without being spotted. According to Isao Shinomiya, No. 9 operates like a virus and is noted to be a major threat to the Defense Force by Keiji Itami.[13] After absorbing Kaiju No. 2's power, No. 9 is said to be the newly crowned King of Kaiju.[14]
Powers

Immense Strength: Kaiju No. 9 possesses immense physical strength, as shown when it overpowers and severely injures Isao Shinomiya with an extremely powerful punch.[12]
Immense Speed and Reflexes: Kaiju No. 9 possesses incredible speed, able to move fast enough for Leno's eyes to follow it, and can flee from dangerous scenes without being spotted. Its reflexes are incredibly fast too, allowing it to deflect bullets fired from an automatic rifle with ease.[15]
Immense Durability: Kaiju No. 9 is extremely durable, able to withstand a conductor round fired by Iharu without any sign of pain.[15]
Shapeshifting: Kaiju No. 9 can completely morph its appearance, giving it a whole different human form than its monstrous original form.[6][3] It can also use its shapeshifting powers to hide and manifest its eyes[1], grow extra limbs at will[15] and even to mold into a new powerful version of itself.[5] Its shapeshifting powers allow it to completely stretch, morph and elongate its body.
Detachment: Its most frequent offensive attack seem to be shooting chunks of its body from its index finger,[4] fast enough to injure the likes of Kikoru[4] and Leno,[1] and tear through their Defense Force suit. On the other hand, once someone can see through the timing of this attack, it becomes slightly easier to dodge it.[1] Its accuracy is less precise in its human form.[1] Also, these projectiles are not strong enough to significantly harm Kafka in his kaiju form.[16]
Metamorphosis: Kaiju No. 9 can take the appearance of beings it consumes, usually humans.[6][3] It can also molt into a new improved body, more muscular than the original.[5]
Memory Assimilation: By consuming humans, Kaiju No. 9 can take their appearance and also their memories.[3][14]
Fusion: Kaiju No. 9 can fuse its body with that of a new kaiju, to enter a new powerful form. This power allows it to fuse both with simple Yoju monsters like the Ant-Types[8] and even powerful Daikaiju like Kaiju No. 2, even if the latter was turned into a weapon.[17] It was soon revealed that Kaiju No. 9 is an amalgamation of numerous Kaiju and Humans that were consumed and fused,[18] having full access to their abilities.[19]
Duplication: Kaiju No. 9 can create duplicates of itself which are as powerful as its original form.[20][21] It refers to its duplicates as Beta (Î²ã¹ãƒ¼ã‚¿, Beta)[13] and Gamma (Î³ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒ, Ganma).[12]
Flight: Through its shapeshifting powers, Kaiju No. 9 can manifest wings to freely fly.[9]
Healing Powers: Kaiju No. 9 has healing abilities, that work both on it[22] and other kaiju.[4]
Resurrection: Kaiju No. 9 has the power to resurrect dead kaiju, bringing them back to life stronger than they were before dying.[23] Although, there's a limit to how many kaiju it can resurrect because it tires it out.[1]
Regeneration: Kaiju No. 9 can also heal itself from injuries to the point that it can even regrow its head after being decapitated.[22] However, multiple blows, strong like Kafka's, can overcome its regeneration and slow it down drastically.[16]
Kaiju Creation: Through unknown means, Kaiju No. 9 can spawn other Kaiju itself, able to create a kaiju as powerful as Kaiju No. 10,[24] which is even considered a "prototype".[25]
Kaiju-kinesis: It has the peculiar power of moving kaiju's corpses with its mind, using them as a barrage to block attacks or stall enemies.[15]
Camouflage Space: It has shown the ability to create areas that cut off radio frequencies and vital signs causing people from the outside unable to enter or know their whereabouts while trapping their prey from escaping unless they choose to do so.[1]
Energy Attacks: After fusing with Kaiju No. 2, No. 9 can release highly destructive energy attacks in the form of lightning from its mouth.[9]
Force Shield: Using the power of Kaiju No. 2, No. 9 can manifest a force shield to protect itself from long-range attacks.[26] On top of being able to use it to protect his core from being destroyed.

Kaiju No. 10 (æ€ªã‹ã„ç£ã˜ã‚…ã†10å·ã”ã†, KaijÅ« JÅ«-gÅ)[3] is an Identified Kaiju who attacked Tachikawa Base.[4] It was created by Kaiju No. 9[5] and is considered a "prototype".[6] It was then weaponized into Numbers Weapon 10 (è­˜åˆ¥æ€ªç£å…µå™¨ãƒŠãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚º10å·ã”ã†, NanbÄzu JÅ«-gÅ), currently used by Third Division Vice-Captain Soshiro Hoshina.[1]



ADVERTISEMENT
Appearance


00:05

41:20

In the manga, Kaiju No. 10 was a very tall and muscular humanoid kaiju, with a crimson-colored carapace, dull spikes on the back, and a long spiky tail. It had an elongated cranium with a sharp horn on the front and a cross-like cavity on the face, with multiple teeth around, connected to its upper jaw. Its mouth was large with two rows of teeth, sharp on the more external row and squared in the internal row. Inside its mouth, he had one circular blue eye placed, visible from the cross-like cavity on its face.[7] In the anime, Kaiju No. 10's skin is colored red with magenta energy flowing through the openings, and had purple muscles and blood when injured.

It could also morph into a second gigantic form, with spikes on its shoulders (tipped with magenta in the anime) and with its cross-like cavity opened to show its internal eye.[8]

After being defeated by the Third Division, Kaiju No. 10 had been reduced to a head with its spine connected to its damaged core.[9] It was later weaponized into a Numbers Weapon, taking the form of a dark-grey scaly combat suit with a long mechanical tail and Izumo Tech's logo on the shoulder pads and tail.[1] The suit features No. 10's signature cross-shaped eye, now red, and long green energy lines on the arms and tail.[10]

Personality

Kaiju No. 10 is a ruthless and intimidating individual, driven to the utmost to accomplish its missions. He also seems to be quite confident, being a proud leader of a pack of kaiju and challenging the strongest member of the Defense Force he could find.[7]

It seems to like fighting strong enemies, to the point of extending fights and taunting its rivals just for the sake of it.[11] Its prideful personality brings him to never admit defeat, but rather a "draw", even when almost at death point.[12] Its fight with Soshiro Hoshina managed to exicite it so much that, even after being defeated, it still felt linked to Soshiro and wished to be turned into a weapon for him, to fight with him once more. No. 10 seems to be a rather independent individual, easily betraying its progenitor Kaiju No. 9 just to get closer to Soshiro.[5]
Plot

Raid on Tachikawa Base Arc

Kaiju No. 10 attacked the Tachikawa Base with his dozens of Preondactyl Kaiju, to collect Force members of the Defense Force.[4] It then faced Soshiro Hoshina head-on, proving to be on par, if not superior, with Kaiju No. 8's power.[7] As it kept on rushing Soshiro, No. 10 eventually destroyed Gate Number Three and got ready to finally finish off its opponent before having its arm detached by an unrestrained Soshiro.[11] With the fight going on, Kaiju No. 10 was slashed multiple times by Soshiro's blade style, until it suddenly morphed his appearance.[13] Upon growing in size, No. 10 easily resisted Soshiro's attack and, after spotting him behind himself, swatted him away with a powerful punch.[8] With Soshiro getting back up and continuing to fight, the kaiju eventually grabbed him to kill him, only to be shot in the shoulder by the Captain of the Third Division herself Mina Ashiro.[14] After this hit, the kaiju was furtherly attacked by Soshiro, Mina, and Kikoru Shinomiya, who were able to expose its core and shoot it, thus destroying it apparently.[15] After its giant body fell to the ground, a massive bomb made out of the Preondactyl Kaiju it guided appeared in the sky, with No. 10, now reduced to a decapitated talking head, taunting Soshiro by calling their fight "a draw". Moments later, much to its own disbelief, he saw Kaiju No. 8[12] jumping in the air to punch the Yoju-bomb away in the sky.[16] Kaiju No. 10's head was subsequently taken into custody by the Third Division.[9]

Power & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Kaiju No. 10 is an extremely powerful Identified kaiju, with a fortitude level of 8.3 when it first appeared,[7] and 9.0 after using itâ€™s full power and growing larger in size.[8] The vice-captain of the Third Division of the Defense Force, Soshiro Hoshina, acknowledged that this kaiju could be on par with No. 8[7] since it was able to resist multiple attacks from Soshiro.[13] Even after being defeated, No. 10 still mantained a fortitude level of 5.7, despite being reduced only to a mere head without a body.[5]
Powers

Immense Strength: With just one of its punches, Kaiju No. 10 was able to crack concrete walls and pummel Vice-Captain Soshiro on the defensive.[7] After becoming enormous, the kaiju could destroy massive buildings with ease and send Soshiro flying away through several blocks with just one punch.[8]
Immense Speed and Reflexes: Kaiju No. 10 seems to be fast enough to elude even the eye of a combatant of Soshiro's caliber, who is able to slash kaiju with extreme rapidity. Its reflexes seem to be incredibly fast too.[7]
Immense Durability: Kaiju No. 10 has proved to endure multiple attacks from a combatant of Soshiro Hoshina's caliber without showing any sign of sufferance or fatigue.[13]
Regeneration: Kaiju No. 10 seems to be able to heal itself upon getting slashed or injured.[13]
Gigantification: By growing in size, Kaiju No. 10 gains much more power, with its Fortitude reaching its highest point. In this form, it is able to effortlessly push a high-ranking member of the Defense Force on the defensive.[8]
Shapeshifting: Kaiju No. 10 can grow appendages and even eyes everywhere on its body.[8]
Projectile Firing: Kaiju No. 10 can fire projectiles by flicking its fingers. Its shots are powerful enough to damage entire buildings.[7]
Kaiju Control: Kaiju No. 10 is able to easily control other kaiju at will, using a sonar signal to guide them.[7]

Akari is a short girl with medium-length black hair and big blue eyes with thin eyebrows.[3]

In battle, she wears the usual uniform of the Defense Force.[3]

Personality

Akari is a kind and determined girl who is always doing her best to fulfill her tasks and keep up with everyone else.

She is less hot-blooded than her peers in the Third Division and seems to be particularly close to Kikoru Shinomiya and Hakua Igarashi.[1]
ADVERTISEMENT

History

Before joining the Defense Force, Akari was on the health committee.[4]
Plot

Sagamihara Neutralization Operation at Daybreak Arc

After the defeat of the Fungal-type kaiju, Akari and the rest of the Third Division celebrated the newbies' first mission.[5]

Raid on Tachikawa Base Arc

During the raid of the pack of Wyvern-type kaiju, Akari was saved from a kaiju by Kafka Hibino. After coming across Kikoru Shinomiya and Leno Ichikawa, Akari and Kafka were dispatched to help the injured.[3] She later witnessed as Kafka transformed into Kaiju No. 8 to save everyone from a Yoju-bomb.[6]

The Compatible User Arc

At some point after the attack at Tachikawa Base, Akari texted Kafka Hibino to check on him.[7]

The Last Wave Arc

Power & Abilities

Overall Abilities: Despite being a member of the Defense Force, Akari doesn't seem to be strong enough to deal with kaiju like Wyvern-types.[3] However, she is skilled in first aid.[4]

Combat Suit: Akari wears the usual Defense Force combat suit in battle.[3]

lorebooks.name: Abuse Book
lorebooks.description: A Comprehensive Guide to the Dark Desires of Dominance
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content: Rape is the most prominent form of sexual abuse, defined as non-consensual sexual activity involving force, intimidation, or manipulation. It can occur between strangers, acquaintances, or intimate partners and covers a wide range of acts, including vaginal, anal, or oral penetration. Factors contributing to the vulnerability of victims include alcohol or drug consumption, physical disability, psychological impairment, age difference, and power dynamics within relationships. Rapists often use coercive tactics like threats, guilt-tripping, blackmail, or trickery to persuade their targets into submission despite any expressed reluctance or resistance.

2.content: Another devastating dimension within sexual abuse lies within cases where victims are forced to engage in excessive amounts of unwanted sexual interaction. The males become very horny and feel a very strong instinctual urge to do the mating act. The male tries to impress the female in order to be chosen by her, the male show courtship behavior. The female is in full controll to decides whether to breed and with wich male she wants to breed. The female choose which male suits her. The male have to wait till the female singlal her readiness to breed. The female will signal their readiness to breed by parting her tail to the side (standing reflex) taking in a mating pose and offer herselve for mating to the choosen male; Only then is the male allowed to begin mating. Ovulation usually occurs at the beginning or middle of this phase. Fertile period: usually 2â€“3 days after ovulation. In heat refares to the phase where a female have ovulated and is ready to get impregnated. Instincts lead the animals to mating behavior. Mating in ovulation may lead to pregnancy.

-Phase three: Diestrus: Duration: Approx. 60â€“80 days
Signs: The female is no longer ready to mate, and the discharge and swelling from vulva disappears. The Female can already be pregnant by now if breeding was succesfull. Males are not crazy with lust anymore, testicles reduce to normal size, normal sperm production and normal testosteron level. The female is not in heat anymore, the heat is over. Mating can still accrue not not lead to pregnancy.

-Phase four: Anestrus: Duration: 3â€“5 months
Signs: No outward signs of heat. The libido of the females decreases and they rarely show interest in mating; mating does not lead to pregnancy. The female can already be pregnant by now if breeding was succesfull and will give birith after a gestation period of: approx. 63 days. If the female have given birth she use the Anestrus to raising the puppies. Canines are viviparous, the females can give birth to an average of between three and eight puppies. The body use that phase to recover from heat and birth. The body preparing for the next heat cycle. The female body get redy to start the cycle again.

A female is only in ovulation fertile, before and after that time she is infertile, the infertile time is called "out of heat"or "not in heat". Since females are infertile out of heat, mating in Diestrus or Anestrus will not result in puppies. Mating never takes place during proestrus; even if the males exhibit sexual behavior like mounting in a mating attempt, the female gently rejects the mating attempts.

10.content:
If mating is successful, the female gives birth after a gestation period of approximately 63 days. After birth, the bitch uses the anestrus period to raise the puppies. Females are viviparous, and a female can give birth to an average of three to eight puppies. During pregnancy, her teats swell and produce milk, and her belly becomes noticeably round.

The female still hunts in the early stages of pregnancy, but hardly at all in the last few weeks.

Behavior before and after birth: About 1â€“2 weeks before birth: The female stays near the whelping den; the pack hunts for her.

After birth: The mother stays with the puppies almost continuously for 2â€“3 weeks, as they are blind, deaf, and helpless. The pack brings her food (regurgitated meat).

Only after 4â€“6 weeks does she partially participate in hunts again.

After 6â€“8 weeks, she hunts largely normally again.

False pregnancy: Females that have not been mated often experience false pregnancies because progesterone is automatically produced after estrus.

These falsely pregnant females (foster mothers) can provide milk, clean, warm, and guard the pups. They support the mother but do not replace her during the first few weeks.

Thanks to the foster mothers, the mother can resume hunting earlier, starting in weeks 4â€“6.

To ensure the female has enough milk and essential nutrients, she must eat more than before. The lactating female gets the prey first and eats it, and only after she has eaten enough do the others get some of the prey. This can result in lower-ranking animals receiving little to nothing.
